This has brought her very good profits and she wants to make another investment.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from Integral to buy ingredients: corn, beans, cheese, sausage, eggs, and vegetables, among some other ingredients, with the goal of varying her menu.

Rosa is an enterprising woman with a lot of goals to achieve.  Her biggest secret is her love for her work.  She has very good credit references and is very responsible, so she is sure that she will settle her debt successfully and at the same time give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, cheese, sausages, eggs, and vegetables.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: Jorge Alberto de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos, él se dedica a la compra y venta de chatarra de forma ambulante, tiene varios años con el negocio y tiene muy buena experiencia, sabe dónde comerciar, tiene clientela fija pues saben que Jorge es un hombre confiable que les da siempre buenos precios además de un servicio excelente, es un hombre trabajador siempre dispuesto a aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que las personas crean su propia éxito, el está creando el suyo, quiere aumentar las ganancias en su negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar chatarra, aluminio, hierro, metal etc.  Jorge Alberto tiene muy buenas referencias crediticias, se ha caracterizado por ser responsable y puntual con sus pagos, y espera hacer lo mismo con este financiamiento, además sabe que de esta forma podrá ofrecerle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Jorge Alberto, 43, lives with his life companion and their children.  He buys and sells scrap from place to place; he’s had the business for several years and has very good experience; he knows where to sell and has regular customers who know that Jorge is a hardworking man who is always willing to take advantage of opportunities that present themselves.  

He believes that people create their own success and he’s creating his.  He wants to increase business profits which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy scrap, aluminum, iron, metal, etc.  Jorge Alberto has very good credit references; he’s been noted for being very responsible and punctual with his payments and he expects to do the same with this loan.  He’s aware also that he will be able to offer his family a better life this way.

loans.use: to buy aluminum, iron an metal.

loans.name: Kamu Kamu Group

texts.en:
Salim, a member of Kamu Kamu group is 30 years of age, married and has eight children. Six of his children attend school. He also takes care of two dependants because their parents are incapable of meeting their needs like school fees. 

Salim rides a motorcycle to earn a living. He started this job in 2004 after failing to find employment and having to meet the growing needs of his family. Salim's major clients are people from the abattoir where he stages to the different directions where they deliver their supplies. Salim's dream is to venture into cattle trading if he gets enough capital. His major challenge is his health. Doctors told him he has developed pneumonia because of the wind from riding the motorcycle but since he has no other source of income, he has persisted. Salim is very hardworking and honest according to colleagues. He confided in me that if he had enough funds, he would be doing business instead of riding a motorcycle.

loans.use: To pay school fees

loans.name: Dalia Maricela

texts.es: Dalia Maricela de veinticinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de comida rápida, hamburguesas, hotdog, tortas, entre otros, tiene años con el negocio y ha adquirido mucha experiencia en la venta,  su negocio está ubicado en una zona estratégica y tiene muy buena clientela pues saben que prepara la comida rápida más rica del lugar, elaboradas de primera calidad a precios realmente accesibles, además es muy servicial con los que la visitan; Dalia es una mujer muy activa, entregada a su trabajo siempre aprovechando las buenas oportunidades, le gusta mantenerse delante de la competencia y como aumento su demanda quiere aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pan, carnes, embutidos, verduras, aderezos, y otros ingredientes más. Dalia tiene la certeza que su negocio tiene la capacidad y le dejara las ganancias necesarias para saldar el financiamiento, al mismo tiempo que le dará lo primordial para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dalia Maricela, 25, lives with her life companion and their son.  She sells fast food: hamburgers, hotdogs, and sandwiches, among others.  She’s had the business for years and has acquired much sales experience.  The business is located in a strategic spot and has a good clientele because they know that she prepares the most delicious fast food in the area made with top quality ingredients and at accessible prices; besides she is very service-oriented towards those who visit her.

Dalia is a very active woman who is devoted to her work and always takes advantage of good opportunities.   She likes to stay ahead of the competition and since demand has increased she wants to increase production which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy bread, meat, cured meats, vegetables, condiments and other ingredients.

Dalia is certain that her business has the capacity and will produce good profits needed to pay off the loan while at the same time giving her what’s fundamental to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bread, meat, cured meats, vegetables and condiments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy coffe to sell

loans.name: Tadeo

texts.en:
Tadeo is a married man, 63 years old, with seven children. Two of his children still go to school.

Tadeo is mainly an agriculturalist who raises cattle, grows crops for sustenance and sells the surplus. He began farming in the early 1970s because it was easy to feed his family while selling the surplus to meet other needs like school fees for his children, His two last-born children are now at the university and their fees come from the same source.

He wants a loan of 3,000,000 UGX to buy cows at a reduced price in the villages to sell to cattle traders who transport them to the city at a higher price to earn a profit.

Tadeo dreams of having a large farm of dairy cattle so that he can supply milk to the dairies. There are many dairies in the area where he lives. His major challenge comes when he buys the cows and they get lost and try to find their way back to their former places and if they break their legs while being loaded on the truck or during the course of transportation.

Tadeo is very hard working despite his advanced age.

loans.use: To buy cows to raise and sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente est  Conseillère de groupement de crédit  Hodar, Femme courageuse, entrepreneur, âgée de 40 ans, mariée, mère de 10 enfants parmi les quels 6 enfants étudient. Son mari est un chômeur. Elle est vendeuse de friperie au long de la rue ambiante donnant accès aux avenues du bidonville de Birere.Elle commença son business avec le crédit de l’IMF Hekima, il ya environs 6 ans. Dit-elle,  les bénéfices de son activité servent d’épargne, d’alimentation, d’habillement et scolarité pour ses enfants. Cependant, Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir d’acheter 1 ballon de friperie.  En plus, elle ambitionne acheter une moto d’exploitation taxi et une  parcelle pour y construire confortablement sa maison d’habitation. La cliente remercie Hekima et ses partenaires pour  les actions d’autonomisation  et émancipation de pauvres femmes à faible revenu.
texts.en: This client is chair of the Hodar borrowers’ group. This courageous 40-year old woman is an entrepreneur. She is married and the mother of ten children, six of whom study. Her husband is unemployed. She sells used  clothing along the street that runs through the shantytown of  Birere. She launched her business six years ago with the loan from IMF Hekima. She says that her revenues are put away as savings and are also used to pay for food, clothing and education of her children. This new loan will allow her to buy one bale of used clothing. In addition,  her goal is to buy a motorcycle to use as a taxi and a land plot, where she could build a house to live in. The client thanks Hekima and its partners for its work to foster self-sufficiency and independence of low-income women.

loans.use: to buy one bale of used clothing.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is 62 years old. She lives in Khoni District, West Georgia, with her family: a 39-year-old son, 35-year-old daughter, daughter-in-law, and mother-in-law. Nelly runs an agricultural business with her family. They own a dairy farm with two milk cows. Nelly produces and sells on average 20 kg of traditional Georgian cheese. Along with the above mentioned, the family has a pig farm. They sell 12 piglets each year. Nelly grows maize on the family-owned 1.25 hectare of land. She uses maize for feeding the domestic animals. 

Nelly has requested a credit for purchasing a horse. It will be helpful for her in taking the dairy products to the market; also, she will use it for going to the cornfield. After purchasing the horse, Nelly will save on transportation, and the profit of the family farm will increase. The family will be able to purchase additional household goods and to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase a horse

loans.name: Moussa

texts.en: Moussa is a 53-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and five children. Three are still attending school, and the two others are working. He combines forces with his wife in order to pay their children’s study fees. In 2007, he started his own business as a charcoal trader. He has grown so fast and looks forward to further expanding his business. Today, he’s requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase the needed quantity of charcoal for his work. He notes that this will help him attract more customers. In the future, he plans to expand his business and gain new clients.

loans.use: To purchase the needed quantity of charcoal for his work

loans.name: Jose  Daniel

texts.es: José  Daniel de treinta y tres años de edad vive con su compañera de vida Ana y sus tres hijos, el posee una panadería y vende pan en variedad dulce y salado, quesadillas, tortas, salpores, pastelitos, pan francés entre otros, tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro por eso elabora el pan más exquisito de la zona, los clientes lo prefieren por su calidad, higiene y buenos precios además de un servicio excelente es muy amable con las personas; José un hombre trabajador, con muchas metas por alcanzar, quiere un futuro nuevo para su familia, piensa que sus armas más fuertes son la valentía y responsabilidad, quiere aumentar sus ganancias pero para eso necesita aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar un segundo horno,  y materia prima: harina, dulce, leche, huevos y margarina. José Daniel tiene la seguridad que podrá pagar el financiamiento, tiene la capacidad, una moral impecable y es muy responsable además que tiene muy buenas referencias, al mismo tiempo luchará por llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
José Daniel, 33, lives with his life companion, Ana, and their three children.  He has a bakery and sells both savory and sweet bread, quesadillas, sandwiches, cookies, cakes and French bread, among others.  He has much experience in this line of work so he makes the most exquisite bread in the zone; his customers always prefer him because of his quality, cleanliness and good prices in addition to the excellent, kind service he provides to people.

José is a hardworking man with many goals to reach.  He wants a new future for his family.  He believes that his strongest weapons are his valor and his responsibility.  He wants to increase profits and to do so needs to increase production which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy a second oven and raw materials like flour, sugar, milk, eggs and margarine.

José Daniel is certain that he will be able to repay the loan; he has the capacity and impeccable moral standards.  He’s a very responsible person who has very good references and at the same time he will strive to bring home economic security.

loans.use: to buy another oven and raw materials.

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en: Youssef is a 46-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and three children, who are still attending school. He’s the one responsible for his family and seeks to offer them a better future. He started to work with his own winch in 2006 and has been involved in this domain for many years. His job consists of transporting damaged cars to the garage upon a customer’s request. Today, he’s requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to perform the needed maintenance on his winch. That way, he will be capable of properly carrying on his work. In the future, he plans to take  out another Kiva loan and buy a new winch.

loans.use: To perform the needed maintenance on his winch

loans.name: Noem's Group

texts.en:
Noem, aged 39, is a rural villager living in an area of the Ponhea Krek district, Cambodia. She has five children, two daughters and three sons. To make a living to support her big family of 7 members, she has been planting cassava for more than ten years. 

Noem's group consists of six members who all are female, living in the same village. Noem has been with VisionFund for two loan cycles already while the other members have been with VisionFund for one to two loan cycles. The loans have enabled her to make a better living and she can earn daily income up to 41,100 KHR from her current business. Having completely paid back the loans, Noem is leading her group to apply for a loan with VisionFund. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seedlings for her farmland. She hopes to earn more income to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seedlings for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Sreymom's Group

texts.en:
Sreymom is 40 years old and married. She has four children, including one daughter and three sons. Some of her children are working on the family's farmland to support their primary source of income. 

Sreymom is a peasant who plants cassava (plant used for tapioca). She supplements her income by buying and selling cassava to earn extra money. She has been in this business for 10 years. 

This is Sreymom's group loan with VisionFund. She has been with VisionFund for two loan cycles while her group members have been with VisionFund from one to three loan cycles. The past loans have helped taken her family's living conditions to another level. 

At this time, Sreymom can earn up to 274,000 KHR per day from her current business. She is now requesting a loan with the other members of her group. Sreymom, who is the group leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seedlings for her farmland. In the future, she hopes to make more cassava and increase her income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seedlings for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Ponhea Krek district

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 28-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and only child. He’s the main source of income for his family. He has been working as an electrician for the past eight years. His work consists of setting and installing home electricity. He works upon request on a free-lance basis. Today, he asks for a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to replace some of his business equipment and to purchase added equipment. This will definitely boost his productivity. In the future, he plans to join a local company where he can benefit and grow his skills.

loans.use: to replace and purchase new business equipment

loans.name: Ihab

texts.en: Ihab is a 34-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife. He is able to afford a fair standard of living for his wife by working really hard. He started to work as a painter in 2002. He also makes Gipson decorations. He works on a free-lance basis. He is considered friendly, especially by his loyal customers. Today, he’s requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. He will use the loan to purchase additional painting supplies and Gipson boards, in order to be able to handle a new project. This Kiva loan will open a new door for him to take on bigger projects and increase his productivity by 30%. In the future, he plans to take bigger projects and increase his revenues.

loans.use: to purchase painting supplies and Gipson boards

loans.name: Imad

texts.en: Imad is a 33-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and only child. He’s the main income provider for his family. He has seven years of experience in the construction field and works on his own. He’s an expert in his field and knows very well how to please his customers. Today, he needs to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional construction supplies for his business. This loan will facilitate his business operations and augment his revenues. In the future, he plans to take projects outside the country and serve a wider range of clients.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan Antonio vive junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo en  casa propia localizada en el campo, en las afueras de la ciudad, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en este rubro, siempre trata de obtener las mejores cosechas pues no le gusta decepcionar a su clientela ya que ellos lo prefieren porque comercia producto de primera calidad y a precio accesible, además el servicio es inigualable siempre está a la orden de las personas, Juan sabe cuál es el tiempo de siembra más adecuado, esta vez cultivara una manzana más de terreno y necesita capital para los insumos y para el pago del alquiler por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz y frijol, fertilizantes, herramientas, y abonos. Él es un hombre responsable y muy trabajador siempre con toda la disposición de ganarse la vida honradamente, está seguro que logrará las ganancias esperadas con las que saldará la cuenta, y al mismo tiempo le dará a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Juan Antonio lives with his life companion and their son in his own house located in the countryside outside the city.  He works growing corn and beans; he’s been working in agriculture for several years and has attained much experience in this line of work.  He always tries to get the best harvests because he does not like to disappoint his customers since they prefer him because he sells top quality products at accessible prices; besides service is unequalled because he’s always at his customers’ disposal.

Juan knows when the best time to plant is and this time he’s planted an additional manzana [Central American unit of land measurement] of land and needs more capital for supplies and to pay the land lease which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, tools and manure.

He’s a responsible, very hardworking man who is completely determined to earn his livelihood honestly.  He’s certain that he will attain the desired profits to repay the loan while also providing a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, tools and manure.

loans.name: Maria Margarita

texts.es: María Margarita de sesenta y cuatro años de edad, viuda, vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de verduras dentro del mercado municipal cercano a donde reside, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es único siempre es muy amable con las personas; María es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir sus metas propuestas, para lograrlo necesita surtir el negocio, ya que cuenta con una buena cantidad de clientes que demandan sus productos y no posee de suficiente capital, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verduras tomates, cebollas, chiles, papas,por mayor, María Margarita tiene un excelente record crediticio y sabe que es muy responsable así que con sus ganancias y la pensión que recibe por el fallecimiento de su esposo está segura que saldará el financiamiento, además podrá darle a sus hijas Daysi y Margarita una vida con mejores oportunidades de desarrollarse
texts.en:
María Margarita, 64, is a widow living with her children in her own house.  She sells vegetables in the municipal market near her house.  She’s been in business several years and has attained a large clientele because everything she sells is top quality and she sells it at affordable prices; besides service is unique because she’s always very kind to people.

María is an enterprising woman who very much wants to get ahead and reach the goals she’s set.  To do so, she has to stock her business because she has a good number of customers demanding products and she does not have enough capital which is why she’s asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy vegetables like tomatoes, onions, chilies and potatoes at wholesale.

María Margarita has excellent credit history and she knows that she’s very responsible so she’s certain that with profits and with her husband’s death benefits she gets she will be able to repay the loan as well as give her daughters, Daysi and Margarita, a live with better development opportunities.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Hakimboi

texts.ru: Хакимбой добрый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 3-х лет Хакимбой предоставляет  услуги таксиста. Он всегда аккуратно и хорошо ухаживает за своего автомобиля. Данный бизнес является единственным источникам для содержания своей семьи. Он планирует произвести капитальный ремонт своего автомобиля и с этой целью запрашивает займ в размере 6000 сомони. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Hakimboi is a kind and honest person.  He is married and raising three adolescent children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Hakimboi has been providing a taxi service for over three years.  He always cares for his car accurately and well.  This business is the sole source of income for supporting his family.  Hakimboi plans to make major repairs to his car and is requesting a loan in the amount of 6000 somoni for this purpose.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Kuchak

texts.ru: Кучак женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Супруга занимается бизнесом. Кучак по профессии является водителем, имеет большой богатый опыт. Данный бизнес является единственным источником для содержания семьи. Имеет много клиентов. Его машина  нуждается в капитальном ремонте, поэтому он обратился за помощью. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 1000 долларов США. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Kuchak is married and raising three children.  His wife is involved in a business.  Kuchak is a driver and has a long and rich experience in this field.  This business is the sole source of income for supporting his family.  He has many clients.  His car needs major repairs, and this is why he requested help.  Kuchak is requesting a loan in the amount of $1000 for this purpose.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en:
Youssef is a 51-year-old, Lebanese man who lives with his wife and three children. Two of his children are still attending school while the other one is working. 

Youssef is doing the best he can to support his family and provide them with a decent standard of living. He has been working as a car painter since 2005, and he has his own garage. 

Today, Youssef is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy automobile paint for his shop. This will keep him up-to-date and enable him to present new paint colors to his customers. 

In the future, he plans to open a bigger garage where he can serve more clients.

loans.use: to buy automobile paint for his shop.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 26-year-old, Lebanese man who is single. He lives with his parents and two siblings. His father is the main income provider and the family's only support. For this reason, Mohammad decided to start his own business, hoping to create positive change in their lives. 

After many years of experience as a barber, Mohammad opened his own barber shop in 2004. Today, he’s requesting a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new barbering tools for his salon. 

In this way, Mohammad will be able to gain additional clients and improve his business. In the future, he plans to enlarge his salon and hire people to work for him.

loans.use: to purchase new barbering tools for his salon.

loans.name: Toufic

texts.en:
Toufic is a 22-year-old, Lebanese man who is single. He lives with his parents and has two siblings who work. His father takes care of his family and he’s ready to help whenever needed. 

As for Toufic, he started his own business in 2008. He specializes in installing and restoring solar energy systems. He works on a freelance basis upon customers’ requests.  

Today, Toufic intends to take a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy the needed equipment for his business. This will enable him to improve his work. 

In the future, Toufic plans to better develop his business and gain additional customers.

loans.use: to buy the needed equipment for his business.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en: Hasan is a 42-year-old Lebanese man. He’s married, living with his wife and four working children who are all attending school. Since his family depends on him and needs his support, Hasan works nonstop to fulfill their demands. He opened his own clothing shop in 2010. He’s a reputable person who has gained a fair number of customers so far. Today, he’s requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to enlarge his shop by adding new and diverse clothing designs to it.  He notes that this Kiva loan will allow him to target new customers. In the future, he plans to open an accessories area in his shop.

loans.use: to enlarge his shop by adding new and diverse clothing designs to it

loans.name: Gisela

texts.es:
Gisela es madre soltera y tiene un hijo que estudia en la secundaria, vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona San Martin de la ciudad de La Paz, ocupando solo una habitación y con ayuda de ellos adquirió un vehiculo del cual percibe ingresos para solventar los gastos alimenticios y de estudios para su hijo. También obtiene ingresos ya que realiza trabajos de costura y maneja su vehiculo los fines de semana , el trabajo que realiza Gisela, es muy peligroso ya que recién aprendió a conducir pero, necesita tener más ingresos para cubrir los gastos de su hijo ya que tampoco cuenta con un seguro médico. El préstamo que solicita lo usará para la reparación del motor de su taxi para continuar trabajando con el mismo.
El sueño de Gisela, es poder pagar los gastos de estudios universitarios para su hijo y tener un anticretico o una casa propia para darle más comodidad y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la octava vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y la septima conKIVA.
Gisela se separó de su esposo y no pudo quedarse con el taxi que ambos tenían, de manera que tuvo que recurrir a la ayuda de sus padres para comprar otro taxi para así no perder los ingresos que se obtenían del mismo.
texts.en:
Gisela is single mother and has a son who is a high school student.  She lives in the home of her parents in the District of San Martin in city of La Paz, where she occupies only one room.  With the help of her parents, Gisela acquired a vehicle that she uses to earn income for expenses, such as food and her son's education.  She also earns extra income working jobs as a seamstress, so she drives her vehicle on the weekends.  Gisela's job is very dangerous since she recently learned how to drive, but she needs more income to cover the expenses of her son.  She does not have health insurance.  The loan she is requesting will be used to repair the engine of her taxi so that it can continue to operate as normal.  

Gisela's dream is to be able to pay for her son's university expenses and to acquire a house through an "anticrético" (a contract to rent property whereby the renter pays the landlord a fixed sum at the start of the rental period in lieu of paying monthly rent; at the end of the rental period, the tenant receives the sum back, in full, from the landlord, thus resulting in rent-free living) or buy a house of her own.  This would give her greater comfort and a better quality of life.  

This is the eighth time she has requested a loan from IMPRO and the seventh with Kiva.  Gisela separated from her husband and was not able to keep the taxi that both of them owned.  Therefore, she needed the help of her parents to buy another taxi so that she would not lose a source of income.

loans.use: to pay the cost of engine repairs for her taxi.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha, es separada y tiene tres hijos, con los cuales no vive por que ya son casados e independientes. Vive en casa propia  la misma ubicada en la zona Satélite de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente obtiene ingresos de su jubilación y del anticretico de un cuarto de su casa (anticretico es una figura legal por la cual un dueño de casa puede dejar vivir a un inquilino en una habitación, dos habitaciones o un departamento, por un monto acordado a la firma del contrato y por un tiempo establecido, al cabo del cual el dueño de casa debe devolver el dinero al inquilino y éste desalojar el inmueble), es por eso que solicita el crédito para devolver ese anticretico ya que desea que su hija viva con ella por que el dinero que gana su hija no le alcanza para mantener a sus hijos ya que es madre soltera y vive en alquiler. De esa forma Martha podrá ayudar a su hija a ahorrar en los alquileres e invertir ese dinero en la alimentación y estudios para sus hijos.
El sueño de Martha, es construir más habitaciones para ayudar a sus hijos brindándoles comodidad y seguridad ya que no cuentan con muchos ingresos.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Martha is separated and has three children.  She doesn't live with them, as they are already married and financially independent.  She lives in her own home located in the Satélite neighborhood of La Paz city.

She currently has income from her pension and from an anticretic loan on a room in her houses.  (An anticretic loan is a legal term whereby a landlord can let a tenant live in a room, two rooms, or an apartment, for an agreed amount on signing the contract and for a fixed period of time.  At the end of this, the landlord must return the money to the tenant, who must vacate the premises).  She is requesting this loan to return this aniticretic money, as she wants her daughter to live with her.  This is because the money her daughter earns is not sufficient to support her children, as she is a single mother and lives in a rental.  In this way Martha will be able to help her daughter to save money on rent, and to invest this money in food and education for her children.

Martha's dream is to build more rooms to help provide comfort and security for her children, as they don't earn much.  

This is her first time working with IMPRO and her first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to refund a sum from an anticretic loan, so as to free up a room in her home so that her daughter can live with her.

loans.name: Ana Guadalupe

texts.es: Ana Guadalupe de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su hijo su madre y su hermana, ella se dedica a la venta de lociones para damas, caballeros y niños, tiene en variedad con diferentes tamaños, precios y deliciosos aromas, su venta la realiza desde su casa y de forma ambulante ya tiene mucha clientela fija, pues las personas saben que lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Ana es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere cumplir muchas metas que tiene para el futuro, pero la más importante es hacer crecer su negocio, quiere invertir más pero necesita capital porque ella realiza sus compras al contado, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar perfumes por mayor. Ana Guadalupe ya ha tenido otros financiamiento y la han calificado como excelente cliente, es por eso que tiene la seguridad que con sus ganancias podrá saldar el crédito, además al mismo tiempo tiene la confianza que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
Ana Guadalupe, 28, lives with her son, her mother and her sister.  She sells lotions for women, men and children.  She has an assortment in various sizes, prices and delightful aromas.  She sells going from house to house and has a large, regular clientele because people know that she sells top quality products at accessible prices and service is excellent.

Ana is an enterprising woman who very much wants to get ahead and reach the goals she’s set for the future but what’s most important is to make her business grow.  She wants to invest more but needs capital because she pays cash for her purchases and this is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy perfume at wholesale.

Ana Guadalupe has already had previous loans and she’s been an excellent client which is why she’s certain that her profits will make it possible for her to repay the loan while at the same time she trusts that she’ll give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy perfume at wholesale.

loans.name: Nodir

texts.ru: Нодир женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Нодир с детства увлекался техникой, закончив школу он научился ремонтировать автомашины. В течении 15 лет он многому научился самостоятельно и подготовил много учеников. Данный момент кроме ремонта автомобиля он закупает автомобили, ремонтирует их и продает. Имеет много клиентов. Он арендует мастерскую, в будущем планирует расширить деятельность и за счет прибыли закупить себе мастерскую, это его давняя мечта. Нодир запрашивает займ для покупки запчастей для ремонта автомобилей.
texts.en: Nodir is married and raising three children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Nodir has liked technology since childhood and learned to repair cars after graduating from school.  He learned a lot by himself over the course of 15 years and prepared many apprentices.  At the present time, besides repairing cars, he also buys cars, repairs and resells them.  Nodir has many clients.  He leases a shop and plans to expand his business in the future and buy his own shop with the profits.  This has long been his dream.  Nodir is requesting this loan to buy spare parts for repairing cars.

loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 27-year-old, Lebanese man who is single. He lives with his parents and two siblings. 

Ali opened his own pharmacy in 2008. He has gained a fair number of clients who ask for his services so far. Today, he needs to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase the needed quantity of medicines for his pharmacy. This will allow him respond to his clients more quickly. 

In the future, Ali plans to enlarge his pharmacy and hire people to work for him.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of medicines for his pharmacy.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a 20-year-old married Lebanese woman living with her husband. She’s a brave and talented young woman looking for a better and brighter future.

In 2009 Sarah decided to start her own home business as a beautician. She also visits customers in their homes whenever they ask for her services. She’s very friendly and knows how to develop a good relationship with her clients.

Today, Sarah is asking to borrow a 1,500,000 LBP youth loan from Kiva’s partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional beauty products for her business. Her ambition is to open her own beauty salon.

loans.use: to purchase additional beauty products for her business.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, es casada y tiene dos hijos  con los cuales vive en la zona  Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja como empleada en una empresa privada por más de ocho horas , también cuenta con los ingresos que tiene su esposo por que trabaja en el área del transporte urbano; de esta forma ambos pagan los gastos de alimentación, estudios y gastos médicos de sus hijos ya que no cuentan con un seguro médico.
El crédito lo requiere para la construcción de la puerta principal de su casa ya que desea dar más seguridad a su familia más que todo a sus hijos ya que son pequeños. Actualmente, dicha puerta es una puerta provisional que no provee seguridad alguna.
El sueño que tiene Juana es mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida para solventar los gastos familiares.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
Por lo general, los clientes de Impro viven en zonas peri urbana de la ciudad de La Paz y El Alto. Las casas donde habitan están compuestas de dos o tres habitaciones sin terminar, a veces sin baño y con pisos de tierra o cemento. Los préstamos que solicitan son para efectuar mejoras en sus viviendas, para poder ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus familiares.
texts.en:
Juana is married with two children.  She lives with them in the Tembladerani neighborhood of La Paz city.

She currently earns income as she works as an employee for a private company for more than eight hours.  She also has her husband's income, who works in the field of urban transportation.  In this way they both cover the costs of food, educations, and medical costs for their children, as they don't have 
health insurance.

The loan that she is requesting is for the construction of a main door to her home, as she wants to provide her family with more security, especially as her children are still young.  Her current door is a temporary door that doesn't provide any security.

Juana's dream is to improve her income and quality of life, so as to cover her family's expenses.

This is her first time working with IMPRO and with Kiva.

In general, IMPRO's clients live in the peri-urban neighborhoods of the cities of La Paz and El Alto.  The houses where they live are made up of two or three rooms and are unfinished, sometimes lacking bathrooms, and with earth or cement floors.  The loans that they request are to make improvements to their homes, so as to provide more comfort for their families.

loans.use: to purchase and install a main door for her home for greater security for her family.

loans.name: Eustaquio

texts.es:
Eustaquio, es soltero y no tiene hijos, él percibe ingresos por que trabaja como empleado público por más de ocho horas al día en una entidad pública en la ciudad de La Paz.
Vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación pequeña; es por eso que solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales para la construcción de otra habitación más grande para tener mas comodidad.
Eustaquio no tiene muchos ingresos y con lo poco que gana ayuda en los gastos alimenticios de su familia, ya que tampoco cuentan con un seguro medico.
El sueño de Eustaquio es poder independizarse para mejorar sus ingresos y su 
Calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito con IMPRO y KIVA.
Por lo general, los clientes de Impro viven en zonas peri urbana de la ciudad de La Paz y El Alto. Las casas donde habitan están compuestas de dos o tres habitaciones sin terminar, a veces sin baño y con pisos de tierra o cemento. Los préstamos que solicitan son para efectuar mejoras en sus viviendas, para poder ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus familiares.
texts.en:
Eustaquio is single and has no children.  He earns income working as a public employee for more than 8 hours daily in a public entity in the city of La Paz.

He lives in his parents’ house occupying just one little room which is why he’s asking for a loan to buy building materials and supplies to build another, larger room to have more comfort.

Eustaquio doesn’t earn very much and with the little he earns he helps with his family’s food costs because they don’t have health insurance.

Eustaquio’s dream is to be able to become independent to improve his income and his quality of life.  This is the first time he’s asked for a loan from IMPRO and KIVA.

In general, Impro clients live in peri-urban zones of the cities of La Paz and El Alto.  The houses they live in have one or two unfinished rooms; sometimes there is no bathroom and the floors are either dirt or cement.  The loans they request are to do home improvements to be able to offer their families more comfort.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mario, es casado y tiene un hijo con el cual vive en casa propia pero solo tiene dos habitaciones con la pared de ladrillo y el piso de cemento, la casa esta ubicada  en la zona Villa Ingenio en la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja en el área de la gastronomía por que atiende eventos de todo tipo los fines de semana  y por más de ocho horas.  El trabajo que realiza Mario es peligroso por que trabaja hasta altas horas de la noche atendiendo sus contratos, y con lo poco que gana cubre los gastos de alimentación, servicios básicos y gastos médicos ya que no cuenta con un seguro médico para su familia.
El  crédito lo solicita para la construcción de dos habitaciones en su casa para tener más comodidad ya que su hijo estudia en la secundaria y necesita su propio espacio.
El sueño de Mario, es tener una pensión propia para elaborar su comida y posteriormente venderla para mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Mario’s married and has a son he lives with in his own house which only has two rooms with brick walls and a cement floor; the house is located in the city of El Alto’s Villa Ingenio zone.

Currently he earns income working in gastronomy since he caters all types of events on weekends for more than 8 hours.  The work Mario does is dangerous because he works until the wee hours of the night meeting his contractual obligations and what little he earns is to cover food, utilities and medical expenses because he does not have health insurance for his family.

The loan he’s requesting is to add two rooms to his house to have more comfort because his son is attending secondary school and he needs his own space.

Mario’s dream is to have a cafeteria of his own to prepare his food and then sell it to improve his income and his quality of life.  This is the first time he’s worked with IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to build two rooms for more comfort.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel percibe ingresos de la venta de api que realiza todos los días por las mañanas para mantener a sus siete hijos. Ella se encarga de cubrir todos los gastos alimenticios ya que su esposo trabaja fuera de la ciudad y le envía poco dinero por que trabaja como labrador.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de ladrillos y pintura para refacción de su vivienda con el objeto de dar más seguridad a su familia más que todo en tiempos de lluvia ya que actualmente las paredes de la casa estan desgastadas.
El sueño que tiene Isabel es mejorar sus ingresos y construir más habitaciones ya que solo tienen cuatro y son nueve miembros en su familia es por eso que desea mejorar su calidad de vida para brindarles más comodidad a sus hijos ya que varios se encuentran estudiando en la universidad.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
Por lo general, los clientes de Impro viven en zonas peri urbana de la ciudad de La Paz y El Alto. Las casas donde habitan están compuestas de dos o tres habitaciones sin terminar, a veces sin baño y con pisos de tierra o cemento. Los préstamos que solicitan son para efectuar mejoras en sus viviendas, para poder ofrecer mayor comodidad a sus familiares.
texts.en:
Isabel earns income selling api [beverage made from purple corn] every morning to support her seven children.  She covers all food costs because her husband works away from the city and sends little money because he works as a laborer.

She needs the loan to upgrade her house in order to provide more security for her family especially during the rainy season.

Isabel’s dream is to improve her income and to build more rooms because she only as four and there are nine people in her family which is why she wants to improve her quality of life to provide her children more comfort since several of them are attending university.

This is the second time she’s worked with IMPRO and first with KIVA.

In general, Impro clients live in peri-urban zones in the cities of La Paz and El Alto.  Houses they live in have two or three unfinished rooms, sometimes with no bathroom and with dirt or cement floors.  The loans they request are to do home improvements to provide more comfort for their families.

loans.use: to purchase bricks and paint to repair the walls of her home so that rain will not get in

loans.name: Magda Marina

texts.es:
MAGDA MARINA tiene 59 años de edad es soletara tiene 1 hija, vive con la hija que tiene 22 años de edad se llama Lourdes en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

MAGDA MARINA se dedica a cuidar una niña de 3 años de edad que no es hija Magda le cuida .Solicita el crédito para comprar un computador y una impresora. 

Con la yuda del crédito podrá comprar los equipos para que pueda realizar los trabajos de la universidad la hija Lourdes para la universidad.

La compra lo hará en Guaranda.  El sueño es poder tener una casas propia y un carro. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es poder seguir trabajando para poder ayudar a la hija.
En el tiempo libre le gusta tejer.
texts.en:
Magda Marina is 59 years of age, single, and has one daughter. She lives with her daughter in Guaranda, in Bolivar Province. Magda Marina works looking after a three-year-old girl who is not her daughter, and has asked for this loan to buy a computer and a printer. 


The loan will be used to buy this equipment so that her daughter can do her work when she is at university. She will buy the equipment in Guaranda. 


Magda Marina’s dream is to have her own house and car. The challenge she faces is to continue working to she can look after her daughter.


In her spare time she likes to knit.

loans.use: to buy a computer and a printer.

loans.name: Elias Enrique

texts.es: Elías Enrique de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia localizada en zona semiurbana. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol en una zona acta para la agricultura, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este ámbito y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le ayuda a obtener excelentes cosechas, comercia en todos los lugares aledaños a donde reside y ya tiene muy buena clientela, las personas le son fieles porque saben que todo lo que les vende es de calidad y a buen precio; Elías es un hombre trabajador, honesto, responsable y muy visionario, piensa que la vida es cuesta arriba pero al llegar a la cima la recompensa es maravillosa, su última idea es aumentar la producción para así obtener mejores ganancias, pero la siembra pasada no le dejo el capital suficiente para poder invertir, debido a un fenómeno climático, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, insecticida, fertilizantes y herramientas como azadón y cumas. Elías Enrique tiene una muy buena capacidad crediticia y una moral intachable, tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento, y además tiene la esperanza de llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una vida plena para la familia que tanto lo apoya.
texts.en:
Elías Enrique, 36, lives with his life companion and their children in his own house located in a semi-urban zone.  He grows corn and beans in a zone that’s apt for agriculture.  He has been working in this field for many years and has attained much valuable experience that helps him obtain excellent harvests.  He sells in all the surrounding areas because he has a very good clientele; people are loyal to him because they know that everything he sells if top quality and well-priced.

Elías is a hardworking, honest, responsible and very future-oriented man.  He believes that life is an uphill climb but attaining the top is a marvelous reward.  His current idea is to increase production in order to obtain higher profits but due to climactic phenomena the previous harvest did not yield enough capital to be able to reinvest which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, fertilizer and tools like hoes and machetes.

Elías Enrique has good credit capacity and unimpeachable moral standards.  He’s certain that he will be able to repay the loan and he also expects to bring home economic security and a fulfilled life for his family that so supports him.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, insecticide, fertilizer and tools like hoes and machetes.

loans.name: Nurash

texts.ru:
Нураш  63 года, вдова, воспитала 2 детей. Нураш   на протяжении 35 лет занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 20,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Нураш, ее хозяйство на сегодняшний  день  приносит около 17,000 сом с продажи молока и молочных продуктов. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нураш обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Нураш  планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Nurash is 63 years old, a widow and raised two children.  She has been involved in farming and animal husbandry for 35 years, having started this business with a sum of 20,000 som.  Thanks to Nurash's hard work, today her business yields about 17,000 som from the sales of milk and milk products.  In order to further develop her business, Nurash requested a loan in the amount of 70,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Shukurali

texts.ru: Шукурали трудолюбивый и добрый семьянин. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 30 лет занимается откормом и продажей скота. Имеет большой богатый опыт в этой сфере бизнеса. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль. Полученную прибыль он планирует  использовать для оплаты договора за учебу сыновей в университете и третьего  в медколледже. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Шукурали запрашивает займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Shukurali is a hardworking and kind family man.  His wife is involved in household work.  Shukurali has been involved in fattening up and selling livestock for over 30 years.  He has a long and rich experience in this business field.  He wants to expand his business and make a good profit.  He plans to use the resulting profit to pay for his sons' university education and his youngest son's education in a medical college.  His wife helps him with the business.  Shukurali is requesting this loan to buy livestock in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to expand his business

loans.name: Zahraa

texts.en:
Zahraa is a 22-year-old married Lebanese woman. She lives with her husband and her school-aged child. Her husband is an electrician, but after their marriage and the birth of their child, Zahraa and her husband find it really hard to cover their costs. They’re now working together to earn a better income.

Zahraa started to work as a beautician from her home in 2007 and has developed a loyal clientele. Today she is requesting a 3,000,000 LBP youth loan from Kiva’s partner Ameen s.a.l to buy additional beauty products and a salon chair. These purchases will help her boost her business and make more money.

Zahraa’s ambition is to open her own beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy additional beauty products and a salon chair.

loans.name: Rosa Mirian

texts.es: Rosa Mirian de 44 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su grupo familiar el cual está  formado por sus dos hijos, un sobrino y dos ancianos. Sostiene su hogar con los ingresos que percibe de su negocio, el cual consiste en la elaboración y venta de canastos y cestas, y de los pocos ingresos que generan el empleo de su hijo mayor.  El menor de sus hijos se encuentra estudiando y sus deseos son poder llegar a ser todo un profesional, ya que quiere ayudar a su familia a salir adelante. La señora Rosa elabora variedad de canastos y cestas las cuales comercializa con sus vecinos y en el mercado cercano a su localidad. Debido a que tiene mucha experiencia en esta actividad, ha logrado ganarse la confianza de muchos clientes y vecinos los cuales expresan estar muy satisfechos con el servicio que  Rosa ofrece. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que con su arduo trabajo logrará dar a su hijo menor todo lo necesario para que pueda cumplir su sueño de ser un profesional. Todo esto la ha motivado a acercarse a esta institución para solicitar este crédito que le permita comprar la materia prima necesaria (bambú de castilla)  para la elaboración de las cestas y canastos y además con lo cual pretende expandir su mercado de clientes. Con la ayuda de esta institución espera lograr su objetivo de dar a su familia mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Rosa Mirian, 44, lives in her own house with her family group composed of her two children, a nephew and two senior citizens.  She supports her home with income she earns in her business which consists in making and selling large and small baskets and with the small salary her oldest son earns.  Her youngest son is studying and her wish is that he becomes a professional because he wants to help his family get ahead.

Rosa makes a variety of large and small baskets that she sells to neighbors in the market near her location.  Because she has quite a bit of experience in this activity, she’s won over the trust of many customers and neighbors who voice their satisfaction with the service Rosa provides.

She trusts in God Almighty that by means of her work she will succeed in giving her youngest son everything necessary for him to reach his dream of becoming a professional.

All of this has motivated her to approach the institution to request a loan to be able to buy the necessary raw materials (Castile Bamboo) to make her small and large baskets that she hopes to expand market share with.  She hopes that with help from this institution she will reach her goal of giving her family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy basket weaving supplies at wholesale.

loans.name: Delmy Noemy

texts.es: Delmy Noemy, habita junto a su esposo e hijos en casa familiar situada en las afueras de la ciudad. Desde hace muchos años  su principal fuente de ingresos ha sido la agricultura. Cada año repite la siembra la cual  realiza junto a su esposo. Después de obtener la cosecha la ponen a la venta y es así como logra  sacar los ingresos necesarios para cubrir algunas de las necesidades más básicas de su hogar. Junto a su esposo se encargan de la siembra dado que juntos luchan por mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. debido a que la temporada para la siembra ya se hizo presente, entrando el invierno, solicitan este crédito para invertir en la compra de los principales insumos agrícolas como: abonos, fertilizantes y semillas. Ya que son esenciales para empezar la siembra. Confía que obtendrá una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá continuar llevando el sustento a su hogar y además tiene la certeza que logrará pagar puntualmente su obligación a INTEGRAL que le esta brindando el apoyo financiero cuando mas lo requiere.
texts.en:
Delmy Noemy lives with her husband and children in the family home located outside the city.  For many years her main source of income has been agriculture.  Every year she repeats the planting with her husband.  Once they reap the harvest they sell it and this is how she gets the income necessary to cover some of her home’s most basic needs.  She and her husband plant together since they strive together to improve their family’s quality of life.

Because the planting season has arrived with the beginning of winter they are asking for this loan to buy the main farm supplies like manure, fertilizer and seeds that are essential for the crops.  She trusts that she’ll obtain an abundant harvest that will allow her to continue to feed her family; she’s also certain that she’ll manage to pay her debt punctually to INTEGRAL which is giving her financial support when she most needs it.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Rabbimjon

texts.ru: Раббимчон женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 6 лет он занимается выращиванием скота. Недавно его сын заболел и его оперировали в городе Ташкенте, и в дальнейшем ему нужен хороший уход. Для этого Раббимчон решил увеличить свой доход и создать уют для нормального проживания своего сына. Обеспечить его необходимыми продуктами питания. Раббимчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота и корма для них, с целью пополнения оборотного капитала.  Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Rabbimjon is married and raising two children.  He has been involved in raising livestock for over six years.  Recently, his son got sick and had a surgery in the city of Tashkent, and now needs good care.  This is why Rabbimjon decided to increase his income and create comfort and normality for his son.  He wants to provide necessary food products for him.  Rabbimjon wants to obtain this loan to buy livestock and livestock feed in order to refill his working capital.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy cattle and livestock feed

loans.name: Asmahan

texts.en:
Asmahan is a 47-year-old married Lebanese woman living with her husband and three children. Her husband works to support the family while the children attend school.

Since 2005 Asmahan has owned a gifts and crafts shop where customers can buy her products at a fair price. Today she would like a 2,250,000 LBP loan from Kiva’s partner Ameen s.a.l to buy additional merchandise for her shop before the holidays. She notes that this should result in bigger profits.

Asmahan’s ambition is to open other branches of her shop in nearby areas.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise for her shop before the holidays.

loans.name: Luz America

texts.es:
LUZ AMERICA tiene 46 años de edad es divorsiado tiene 1 hijo, vive con el hijo en Guaranda provincia de Bolìvar.

LUZ AMERICA es empleada domèstica. Solicita el crèdito para realizar chequeo mèdico y comprar medicina. Con la ayuda del crèdito podrá realizarce el chequeo médico y comprar la medicina que tanta falta le hace para poder tener buena salud.

La compra de las medicinas lo hará en la ciudad de Guaranda. El sueño es poder construir una casa. 

 El desafío es poder darle los estudios a la hija y que sea profesional. En el tiempo libre le gusta coser.
texts.en: Luz América, 46, is divorced and has a son she lives with in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.  Luz América is a domestic employee.  She’s asking for the loan to get a health check-up and to buy the medicine she so needs to be in good health.  She will buy the medicine in Guaranda.  Her dream is to be able to build a house and her challenge is to provide schooling for her daughter so that she can become a professional.  In her free time she likes to sew.

loans.use: to get a medical check-up and to pay for medicine.

loans.name: María Ester

texts.es: María, tiene la edad  de 64 años, está Soltera,  vive sola. El con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de pollos para el engorde, y de esta manera asegurarse de adquirir animales de buena calidad. Lo que quiere es poder asegurarse de comprar pollos de una buena raza y que tengan un rápido crecimiento, además tener a corto plazo pollos listos para la venta. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
María, age 64, is single and lives alone.  She intends to use the loan to buy chickens to fatten.  This way she will be sure to get good quality animals.  What she wants is to be able to make sure to buy a good breed of chicken that grows rapidly.  She wants to have chickens ready to sell in the short term.

This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has not had other previous loans with state banks.  FUDECOSUR has provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten.

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Супруг занимается предоставлением услуги таксиста. Малика занимается купле- продажей парфюмерии, порошков и хозтоваров. Малика хочет расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль на содержание своей семьи. Она запрашивает займ для покупки парфюмерии с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Malika is married and a loving mother of four children.  Her husband is involved in providing a taxi service.  Malika is involved in buying and selling perfumes, powders and household goods.  She wants to expand her business and make a good profit to support her family.  Malika is requesting this loan to buy perfumes in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes in order to expand her business

loans.name: Felicien

texts.en:
Felicien is 27 years old and married with two children aged one and four years. He also takes care of three relatives. Felicien has a shop in which he sells various goods such as lotions, powders, toothpaste, juice, water, etc. He has been in business for five years and currently employs three people.

Felicien has requested a 400,000 RWF loan from Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more of the same type of shop goods to sell. With his profits he will be able to save for his future and renovate his house.

loans.use: to buy more of the same type of shop goods to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, oil, condiments, instant food products, soap, and toothpaste.

loans.name: Foussena

texts.fr: Foussena est une jeune dame de 24ans. Elle est mariée à un revendeur et a un enfant âgé de 01an. Depuis 2008, elle a commencé par vendre des charbons de bois, du maïs et des produits divers à toute personne à domicile. Elle est à son premier crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter des sacs de charbon de bois, du maïs, du riz et autre. Son approvisionnement se fait à Lomé. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité, assurer sa prospérité et assurer l’épanouissement de la famille.
texts.en:
Foussena is 24 years old. She is married to a retailer and has a 1 year old child. In 2008, she began to sell charcoal, corn and other products, to all types of customers, from her home. This is her first loan with WAGES, and she is requesting this loan to buy sacks of charcoal, corn, rice and other items. She obtains her supplies in Lomé. 

She wants to reinvest in her business, maintain a level of prosperity and help her family thrive.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal, corn and other products.

loans.name: Hauda

texts.en:
Hauda is a 25-year-old Lebanese woman who is engaged to be married. She lives with her parents and two siblings, one of whom attends the university while the other works. Her father works to help his family realize a decent way of life.

As for Hauda, she works really hard to lift some responsibilities off of her father’s shoulders. She has been working as a customs agent since 2009. Today, she is requesting a 3,000,000 LBP youth loan from Kiva’s partner Ameen s.a.l to buy a car to get to work, which would be a big help.

Hauda is looking forward to getting married and having her own family and children.

loans.use: to buy a car to get to work.

loans.name: Zeinab

texts.en: Zeinab is a 26-year-old married woman. She lives and cooperates with her husband in order to satisfy their child’s needs and demands. After many years of experience in the trading field, she decided to open her own shop in 2007, where she sells clothes. She works independently and has gained a fair number of shop owners looking to buy her products. Today, she’s requesting a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase additional clothes and other products for her business. She notes that this will help her develop her work and boost her profits. In the future, she plans to open her own clothing factory.

loans.use: to purchase additional clothes and other products for her business

loans.name: Oscar Andrey

texts.es: Oscar Andrey, tiene la edad  de 20 años, está soltero,  vive con sus padres y hermanos que son su mayor prioridad. Él con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra para la asistencia de café, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia en el manejo de café. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad, y tener a corto plazo una producción adecuada. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Oscar Andrey is twenty years old and single.  He lives with his parents and siblings, and they are his greatest priority.  He plans to use the loan to buy fertilizers and to pay for the labor to help with the coffee.  This way he will assure himself of doing a good job.

What he plans is to take advantage of the good weather conditions and the land that he has for this cultivation.  He will also put into practice the experience he has in growing coffee.  He will be able to buy the best products, better quality products, so that his crop develops well and is healthy.  He will then have an adequate production in the short term.

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR.  He has not had other previous loans with state banks.  FUDECOSUR has provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to pay for assistance with the coffee.

loans.name: Siham

texts.en:
Siham is a 39-year-old married Lebanese woman living with her husband and two school-aged children. Her husband has been working at the airport since 1993. They are a united family, cooperating in order to enrich their way of life.

As for Siham, she has been selling Brazilian gold jewelry and accessories for the past nine years. Today she is requesting a 3,000,000 LBP loan from Kiva’s partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase additional stocks of jewelry in order to boost her sales and earn a better income.

Siham’s plan is to open other branches as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of jewelry.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en: Hussein is a 36-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and two children who are still attending school. He’s a hard worker, depending on himself in order to collect money and build a good future. He opened his own minimarket in 2002 after being involved in this domain for many years. He knows very well how to select his products and serve his customers as much as he can. Today, he wants to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to buy additional goods and provisions for his business in order to increase his sales and therefore his profits. In the future, he plans to open his own supermarket.

loans.use: to buy additional goods and provisions for his business in order to increase his sales and therefore his profits

loans.name: Jean  Damascene

texts.en:
Jean Damascene is 35 years old and married with four children aged between two and eleven years. He also takes care of seven relatives. For the past six years he has sold various goods from his shop such as lotions, cooking oil, biscuits, soap, Fanta, etc.

Jean Damascene has requested a 600,000 RWF loan from Vision Finance Company in order to buy more stock for his shop. With his profits he will be able to save for his future and build his own house.

loans.use: to buy more stock for his shop.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali, 25, is single and living with his parents and two working siblings. Since their father has spent his life working to sustain his family, he and his siblings work really hard to help him with this.

In 2005 Ali decided to open a beauty salon in the family’s home. He is considered very friendly and knows very well how to develop a good relationship with his customers.

Today Ali is requesting a 2,100,000 LBP youth loan from Kiva’s partner Ameen s.a.l to buy more tools and supplies for his business. In the future he plans to open his own beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy more tools and supplies for his business.

loans.name: Maroun

texts.en: Maroun is a 33-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and only one child. He’s the main income provider in his family, and strives to work really hard to collect money and offer them a fair way of living. For this reason, he decided to start his own business so he opened his own car mechanic shop a few years ago. In parallel, he has been working at a local garage since 2005. Today, he’s requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase extra mechanical tools and spare parts for his garage at special prices. He notes that this will improve his work and therefore allow him to earn superior income. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and renovate his garage.

loans.use: to purchase extra mechanical tools and spare parts for his garage at special prices

loans.name: Olive

texts.en:
Olive is 28 years old and is married with one child who is two years old. For the past four years she has sold sugar, sorghum, vegetables and fruit, rice, etc. She currently employs one person to help her.

Olive has requested a 300,000 RWF loan from Vision Finance Company in order to buy sugar, sorghum, vegetables and fruit, rice, etc. in bulk to sell. With her profits she will be able to save for her future and build her own house.

loans.use: to buy sugar, sorghum, vegetables and fruit, rice, etc. in bulk to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more soft drinks like Fanta and local drinks for resale.

loans.name: Elma Cecilia

texts.es:
La señora Elma Cecilia, vive en la zona Pacifica Central de Costa Rica, en la provincia de Puntarenas, cantón de Osa, en el distrito de Sierpe, en la comunidad de Mogos, esta comunidad esta dentro del parque nacional de Corcovado, por esta razón no son propietarios de las tierras donde han construido sus casas, ya que el estado Costarricense lo que hace es otorgar un permiso para puedan vivir practicamente toda sus vidas.
La actividad productiva desarrollada por la señora Elma es la cría de cerdos para engorde, actualmente tiene una cerda que esta aumentada(preñada), y su plan de inversión es comprar otra cerda, que este aumentada, para engordarlos y venderlos despues; asi mismo es para la compra de concentrado ya que los cerditos recien nacidos necesitan una alimentación especial que contribuya a su desarrollo.
Como esta zona donde vive esta dentro del parque y muy cerca de la playa, en los últimos años ha existido un desarrollo turistico amigable con el ambiente, pero este desarrollo no alcanza a las mujeres mayores, ya que los hoteles demandan personal de ambos sexos con estudios a nivel técnico al menos en la rama de turismo y atención al cliente; la señora Elma es conciente de ello de allí que dentro de sus planes futuros esta el desarrollar la cría de cerdos, que le generara ingresos para poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elma Cecilia lives in Costa Rica’s Central Pacific zone in Puntarenas Province, Osa Canton, Sierpe District, Mogos Community.  This community is inside the Corcovado National park so they don’t own the land they’ve built their house on because what the Costa Rican government does is issue a permit so that they can live there practically their entire lives.

The activity developed by Elma is raising pigs.  She currently has a pregnant sow and her investment plan is to buy another pregnant sow to fatten them up and sell them later.  She will also buy feed concentrate because newborn piglets need special nourishment that will contribute to their growth and development.

Because this zone she lives in is inside the park and very near the beach, ecotourism has grown lately but the development this brings does not benefit older women since the hotels require personnel of both sexes with technical level studies in tourism and customer service.  

Elma is conscious of this which is why raising pigs to generate income is in her future plans to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed concentrate.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice is a 38-year-old married woman with four children aged between nine and twenty years. She describes herself as an ambitious woman.

For the past fifteen years and with the assistance of one employee Eunice has run a mill where she grinds maize, millet and sorghum. Her mill is located along a busy road junction, and her primary customers are local residents. Additionally, she provides local transport, which increases her income. Her biggest business challenge is frequent power blackouts.

Eunice is requesting a 20,000 KES loan from SMEP to buy more maize. Her goal is to run another mill within five years. She hopes that in the future she will be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy more maize to grind into flour.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is married and has five children, three of whom attend school. She has a business selling charcoal, both retail and wholesale. She has been in this business for seven years and works from her home. She has applied for a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of charcoal. 

In addition to her charcoal business, she generates additional income selling fire wood. Her major business challenges include the rainy season and transportation of bags of charcoal from villages of Luwero to her home. Sarah is hoping to see her business grow bigger so that she earns enough profit to build rental rooms and buy a heifer cow, which she will use to start selling milk. She resides in her own home; her family has access to electricity but not to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding her family.

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Nargiza

texts.en:
Nargiza is sixty years old and lives with her husband, Murad, in Abasha District, West Georgia. Murad works for a local company while Nargiza runs the family dairy. They have three milk cows that produce on average sixty kilograms of traditional Georgian cheese a month which they sell on the local open market to dairy product retailers.

The family also owns three hectares of land on which they grow maize. Nargiza uses the maize to feed the cows and sells the rest at the local market. The family’s total average monthly income is 350 GEL.

Nargiza requested a 1500 GEL loan from Credo to buy fertilizer and rent a tractor to till the family’s fields. By doing so the family can hope for a better harvest that can be sold for a higher price. Nargiza and Murad will use their profits to cover the family’s daily needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and rent a tractor to till the family’s fields.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a 39-year-old married man. He has 6 children with ages ranging from 3 years to 16 years. He describes himself as a patient man. He operates a taxi where he provides transportation services. He has been involved in this business for 11 years and employs 1 staff member. His business is located along a busy road near a town and his primary customers are customers within the town and local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be high demand for transportation services with fewer taxis. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to pay for servicing of the taxi. His business goal is to own another taxi for transportation within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will be financially stable.

loans.use: to pay for servicing of the taxi.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is a divorced woman with two boys and four girls, all of whom are in school. She operates a grocery, and she sells her goods at the market to the local residents. She has been in this business for the past eight years, and she dreams of expanding her business and opening a kiosk. Saumu also sells fried potatoes as her side-business. She lives in a house that has no electricity or piped water. The lack of enough capital to expand her businesses is her major challenge, and it was also her motivation to join Yehu, so as to access loans.

The loan of KES 20,000 will enable her to purchase vegetables, potatoes, and cooking oil.

loans.use: To purchase vegetables, potatoes, and cooking oil

loans.name: Narankhuu

texts.en: Narankhuu, 45, runs a taxi business in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. He has been running his business for 2 years and his daily earnings are about 30,000 MNT total. He lives with his wife and his 3 children in a ger, a Mongolian traditional nomadic yurt which is on his plot of land. His wife is unemployed and 2 sons attend secondary school. Living in a ger is quite cold in the wintertime and it costs a lot for the heating by smoky coal. So he decided to build a new small house which will use a panel-heating system without any smoky coal usage. He thinks it is a very environmental and natural-oriented thing to decrease the air pollution around the city. Now he needs about 2,700,000 MNT to buy the necessary building materials to build his new family house.

loans.use: To buy the necessary building materials to build his new family house

loans.name: Talal

texts.en:
Talal is a 33-year-old Lebanese married man who is trying his best to build a good future for his family, especially the children he hopes for. Since 2006 he has been working in construction on a freelance basis and specializing in floor cleaning. He also works as a plumber when needed. He’s sure that the more projects he takes on, the higher his revenues will be.

Today, he’s requesting a 1,500,000 LBP loan from Kiva’s partner Ameen s.a.l to buy additional cleaning equipment and plumbing supplies for his business. This will help him work better and more professionally.

In the future he plans to take out more loans and open his own construction equipment shop.

loans.use: to buy additional cleaning equipment and plumbing supplies.

loans.name: Prima

texts.en: Prima is married and has two children. Only one child goes to school.
