Norma Isablel is very grateful to Ceprodel in advance for the collaboration it offers her, and she hopes to continue working with this institution.

loans.use: buy wire fencing to secure her property.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
El comité  María Auxiliadora tiene 16 integrantes donde todas ellas se esfuerzan siempre y trabajan todas juntas. Es un grupo destacado en el barrio ya que siempre trabajan juntas y de esa forma se ayudan en sus metas y objetivos.
Leonida es la presidenta, y es ella quien siempre orienta a sus amigas a poder trabajar juntas y a no rendirse y luchar por lo que quieren. Leonida tiene un copetín y con esto mantiene a su familia y les da lo que necesitan para una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Ella solicitó el crédito para la compra de galletitas, gaseosas, golosinas y demás productos con los cuales quiere surtir y de esa forma darle buena variedad a sus clientes. Ella y sus compañeras agradecen la oportunidad que están recibiendo de Kiva y fundación paraguaya.
texts.en:
The María Auxiliadora group has sixteen members all of whom make a great effort and work hard together. The group is well-known in the neighbourhood for their mutual support which helps them reach their goals and objectives.

Leonida is the president. She is the person who guides the group so they work together, do not become discouraged, and fight to achieve what they want. She runs a small cafe, and with the income from it she supports her family and provides them with the necessities for a simple but painless life.

Leonida is seeking a loan to buy cookies, soft drinks, candy and other products so she has a good variety to offer her customers. She and her friends are grateful for this opportunity from Kiva and the Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy cookies, soft drinks, candy etc.

loans.name: Vya Raity Group

texts.es:
Vya raity es el grupo que se formó en la ciudad de luque, con 15 mujeres de esa ciudad. Todas ellas son amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad y comentan que se unieron para trabajar juntas y asi poder mejorar las condiciones de ellas y sus familias.
La Sra. Marta se dedica a la venta de helados y tambien los fines de semana a la venta de comestibles, tiene 1 hijo todavia menor de edad. Cuenta ella que todo el esfuerzo que hace es por su hijo, ya que quiere darle lo que necesite para poder estudiar y de esa forma ser una persona de bien, que sirva a los demás.
Ella solicita el credito  para la compra de helados y productos para la elaboracion de comestibles, ella tiene como meta abrir un negocio mas amplio y elevar sus venta asi.
texts.en:
The Vya Raity group is made up of 15 women from the city of Luque, all of whom are friends and neighbors from the community. They formed this group in order to be able to work together and improve their quality of life and the quality of life for their families. 

Marta makes a living selling ice cream and, on the weekends, sells other food items. She has one young son who is her motivation for working hard, since she desires to provide all she can for him and for his future. She hopes to help him grow into a good and deep person who serves others.

She is requesting this loan in order to purchase ice cream and other input items to use in making food and various dishes. Her goal is to grow her business and increase her sales.

loans.use: to purchase ice cream and other products for making food.

loans.name: Colquecancha Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Colquecancha” en la comunidad de Racchi del   distrito del Huayllabamba de la provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de artesanía, venta de verduras, venta de productos secos, engorde de ganado y crianza de animales. 
 
(La señora Antonieta está levantando la mano en la fotografía). La socia Antonieta nació en la comunidad de Racchi y vive en la misma comunidad donde nació, tiene 51 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cinco hijos de edades (27, 25, 23, 21 y 15 años). Su actividad económica principal de Antonieta es la Agricultura, ella vende sus producto tres veces a la semana ósea miércoles, viernes y domingo en la ciudad de Urubamba, ella también vende sus productos en diferente mercados de las ciudad de Calca y Pisaq. Desde los 25 años se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. En esta oportunidad Antonieta requiere el préstamo para comprar productos como papa, habas, cebada, trigo, maíz, avena y otros más.  

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of neighbors and friends formed the Communal Bank “Colquecancha” in the community of Racchi of the Huayllabamba Province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco. This communal bank is formed by people who look for each opportunity to get ahead, and with their daily efforts, give their children a better future. The various members’ jobs include art sales, vegetable sales, dried fruit sales, fattening and rearing animals. 

(Antonieta has her arm up in the photograph). The member Antonieta was born in the community pf Racchi and lives in that same community. She is a 51-year-old, married, mother of 5 children aged 27, 25, 23, 21 and 15. Antonieta’s principal business is agriculture. She sells her products 3 times a week, Wednesday, Friday and Sunday in the city of Urubamba, but also in different markets in the cities of Calca and Pisaq. She’s been selling since she was 25 years old and it’s going well for her thanks to the determination she puts into her business. At this time, Antonieta is requesting a loan to buy potatoes, beans, barley, corn, maize, oats and other.

The members are grateful for the opportunity they have been given and promise to make their payments on schedule. 

Cusco is situated in the district and province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco, in the heart of the ancient Incan city and is well-known for its arqueologocal sites, historic centre, landscapes, history and for being an enchanting city in the southern region of the country. More specifically, Cusco is known for being a very touristic and commercial area, for its traditional fiesta of “Inti Raymi” and for being home to one of the 7 wonders of the world, Machupicchu.

loans.use: buy potatoes, beans, barley, corn, maize, oats and other.

loans.name: Nael

texts.en:
Nael is 31 years old, from Gaza. He is a married man with a son and a daughter.

Nael has been working in the restaurants for 3 years, but lately he's opened a restaurant for himself on the 15th January, 2011. He has one employee. He makes “Shawarma food” – Shawarma is a traditional food in Palestine. Nael asked Ryada for funds to buy new tables, new food machines and to make a simple decoration to attract his customers.

His future ambitions are to be well-known and open new branches all over Palestine and hire employees, which will open new opportunities for many young people that didn’t succeed in their schools. Also, Nael hopes to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy new tables, new food machines and make a simple decoration for his restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Roeurn's Group

texts.en:
Roeurn, age 27, is married and a mother of two dependent children. To earn a living, Roeurn and her husband have been planting cassava and farming rice for nearly 10 years. Their business had problems when the price of cassava dropped. 

Roeurn obtained her first loan from VisionFund in 2007. She and her other two group members are now requesting another loan. As a group leader, Roeurn hopes to use a portion of her loan to buy fertilizers for her crops and seedlings. She hopes this loan will help her to increase income so that she can have sufficient finance to keep all her children in school until graduated.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her crops and seedlings

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en: Rogelio is a 52-year-old, married man with 5 children. He is residing at Militar, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur, Philippines. Rogelio operates a business venture in the agriculture sector, planting and harvesting mangoes for sale to earn a living. He has been 7 years in this business. Each month, he earns 15,000 PHP doing this type of business. He requested a loan of 20,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizer such as manure. Rogelio has been a member of GDMPC for almost a year. In the future, Rogelio wants to make improvements to his house and for his children to finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Kubra Bibi's Group

texts.en: Kubra bibi is 40 years old, married and the mother of seven children, four sons and three daughters. Her oldest son and daughter have left school, but all of her other children attend a nearby school. Her eldest son is employed in a workshop while her daughter helps Kubra manage their home. Kubra’s husband makes a living selling oil to workshop owners and people who sell engine oil. He has been in this field of work for 10 years and both his business and his profits are good. Kubra has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to buy more engine oil for her husband to sell. She is confident that this loan will allow his business to be even more successful.

loans.use: to buy engine oil for her husband to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Ada

texts.es:
La  Sra. Ada tiene 34 años de edad. Tiene una despensa y tambo a lo cual se dedica desde el  año 2002. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora.
Comenta que empezó con un pequeño negocio y que despu￩s gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio ha ido agreg￡ndole m￡s cosas. Su meta es seguir creciendo y de esa forma tener mejores ingresos para el día a día.
Ella solicita el cr￩dito para la compra de bebidas, lácteos, comestibles y demás insumos para abastecer su despensa. Además de eso quiere comprar forrajes para el alimento de sus vacas del tambo.
texts.en:
Sra. Ada is 34 years old. She has a small store and a dairy farm which she has run since 2002. She is a very enterprising and hardworking person. She notes that she began with a small business and that later, thanks to hard work and sacrifice, began adding more products. Her goal is to continue growing so that she will have better earnings for the day to day.

She is applying for a loan to purchase drinks, dairy products, food and other supplies to stock her store. As well, she wants to buy forage to feed the cows in her dairy farm.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her store and forage for her animals.

loans.name: Enma Rosa

texts.es:
Enma es madre de un pequeño de 13 años, a quien ama mucho y trabaja día a dia con mucho empeño para sacarlo adelante y para que tenga una buena calidad de vida; su vivienda se encuentra en el distrito de Parcona, Ica, Perú. Este distrito se caracteriza por un clima cálido y acogedor, también se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de Papa y algodón, también se encuentra algunos Fundos Agrícolas que brindan varios puestos de trabajos a los pobladores de la zona. Cuando tiene un tiempo libre a Enma le gusta escuchar música y también le encanta preparar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz Chaufa”. Ella con el fruto de su trabajo pudo estudiar la carrera de Enfermería Técnica, pero le hubiera gustado Estudiar para ser licenciada en enfermería.

Con mucho entusiasmo Enma salea trabajar en su negocio de venta de abarrotes, ella le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas al dia  y puede atender hasta 20 clientes diariamente, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amiguera y sobre todo muy amable con los clientes.

Enma está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda ayuda que le han  brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como arroz, azúcar,  fideos, atún, entre otros, de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos, así ella seguirá trabajando día a día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle a su hijo una buena profesión y una vida feliz”
texts.en:
Emma is the mother of a 13 year old.  She loves him very much, and she works with great effort every day in order to get him ahead and provide him with a good quality of life.  Her house is in the Parcona district in Ica, Perú.   This district is known for its warm and welcoming climate.  It is also known for its agriculture, especially its potato and cotton crops.  There are a number of large farms in the district that provide jobs to local people. 

When she has free time Emma likes to listen to music.  She also loves to prepare one of her favorite dishes, “Arroz Chaufa” (fried rice).   With the fruit of her labor she was able to study to be a nurse’s assistant, but she would have liked to have studied to be a licensed nurse. 

Emma very enthusiastically goes to work in her business of selling groceries.  She devotes herself to her work for around ten hours a day, and she can tend to 20 customers daily.  She believes that her business is going well for her because she is very friendly, especially with the customers.

She is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help they have given her, she will be able to buy more merchandise for her business.  She will buy things like rice, sugar, noodles, and tuna, among others.  This way she will be able to have a greater variety of products to offer her customers, and this will improve her income.

She will continue working day to day in order to make her biggest dream come true, “To give her son a good profession and a happy life”.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like rice, sugar, noodles, and tuna, among others.

loans.name: Nyamvula

texts.en: Nyamvula is married and the mother of six children, two boys and four girls, two of whom are enrolled in school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped-in water, and dreams of opening a shop in the future. For the last two years, she has earned a living by selling household utensils at a local market. She supplements her income by selling clothing door to door, and farming. She is requesting a loan for KSH 50,000 to buy more household utensils to sell, and to buy planting materials.

loans.use: to buy more household utensils to sell, and planting materials.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
La señora Manuela ahora tiene 57 años de edad, la socia alterna sus actividades del hogar con el comercio minorista, ella se dedica desde hace mas de 10 años a la crianza de ganado vacuno, porcino entre otros animales menores como cuyes y gallinas.

Manuela está solicitando en esta oportunidad el credito para seguir comprando ganado como por ejemplo ovejas. 

La señora Manuela; pertenece al banco comunal “LAS TRIUNFADORAS”; del distrito de Andahuaylillas en Cusco – Perú.
texts.en:
Manuela is 57 years old. She alternates her household activities with a small business.  For the past ten years, she has been raising livestock, pigs, and other small animals such as guinea pigs and hens.

Manuela is taking this opportunity to request a loan to purchase sheep.  Manuela belongs to Las Triunfadoras Communal Bank, located in the district of Andahuaylillas in Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to purchase sheep

loans.name: Kaypacha Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “KAYPACHA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alicia ella es conviviente y tiene 35 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de miel, la socia vende en forma independiente llevando a lugares como Anta y Quillabamba, la socia también vende en los mercados desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de miel. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar miel al por mayor.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo despues de la reunion porque ella pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de servicio de taxi, negocio de venta de materiales de construcción, negocio de venta de productos de belleza, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de confección de ropa.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank "Kaypacha" located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco. 

The member is Ms. Alicia, 35, who is in a committed relationship and has two children. The member works in her business selling honey which she sells as an independent, transporting her product to places such as Anta and Quillabamba. The member also sells her product at markets from 8 am until 6 pm. By means of this small business the member is getting her children ahead. The member wants to expand and improve the honey retail business. The member is seeking the loan to purchase honey wholesale. The small photo that appears next to the larger picture is of a member whose picture was taken after the meeting because she was at work. 

The other members devote themselves to providing taxi service, retailing of construction materials, retailing of beauty supplies, a grocery store, and dressmaking. 

The member appreciates those who make up part of this dream by these means and commits to making her payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: to purchase honey wholesale.

loans.name: Rosa Adelinda

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 30 años de edad, de  estado civil soltera, sin hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia con sus padres, en el caserío Muy Finca, del distrito de Lambayeque. Solo cuentan con el servicio de energía eléctrica y el consumo de agua lo hacen a través de norias artesanales; la mayoría de familias viven  en estas condiciones.

La actividad principal de Rosa es la compra y venta de animales como: patos, gallinas, pavos, cerdos, chivos; ella los engorda a base de concentrado y cuando alcanzan el tamaño y peso exacto los comercializa a los comerciantes de la zona, además cuenta con clientes que lo venden los animales, es decir cuenta con experiencia en este tipo de negocio; así mismo también vende chicha en su domicilio, lo que le permite tener otros ingresos adicionales. 

El  monto del préstamo solicitado por Rosa es de S/. 1,500 nuevos soles y se destinara para la compra  de animales como: patos, gallinas, chivos, cerdos y alimentos balanceados (maíz, polvillo, purina, vitaminas).actualmente  se ha propuesto  en incrementar su negocio esto debido a que es muy rentable en la zona, y esto le va permitir ir mejorando su calidad de vida..
texts.en:
Rosa is 30 years old, and is single with no children. She lives with her parents in their own home in the community of Muy Finca, which is located in the district of Lambayeque. Their community does have access to electricity and running water through a series of wells, and the majority of families in the area live in these same conditions.

Rosa makes a living buying and selling animals, such as: ducks, chickens, turkeys, pigs and goats. She fattens them up by giving them balanced, good feed, and when they reach a certain size, she sells them to buyers in the region. She has a fair amount of experience in this area. She also sells chicha, a traditional Peruvian drink, from her home, which allows her to generate a bit more income.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1,500 nuevos soles, which she will put towards the purchase of animals for her business, such as: ducks, chickens, goats and pigs. She also plans to purchase feed for those animals, which consists of corn, meal, vitamins, etc. She intends to increase her business, since it is a profitable trade in the region, and this will hopefully help her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase animals such as: ducks, chickens, goats, pigs, and animal feed.

loans.name: Eseza

texts.en: Eseza is married with five children and all her children go to school.  She doesn’t take care of additional family members. She has a business of selling used clothes and has been in this business for 8 years. She sells to all categories of people but in retail and at the market. She has applied for a loan of 600000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. Besides this clothing business she generates additional income through selling bananas.  Her major business challenges includes transportation and thieves. She is aspiring to see her business grow bigger so that she can get enough profit to buy a delivery van to ease the transportation and also to become a wholesaler.  She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water.  Her monthly expenses are rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en: Merlina is married and works hard at her fishing business to support her family. She is requesting a loan for PHP 12,000 from NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment. She has been in her current line of work for five years and would like to set aside enough money to give her family financial stability in the future.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en: Rosemarie is 39 years old, married and the mother of six children, four of whom are enrolled in school. She works very hard at her fishing business, and is requesting this loan for PHP 12,000 from NWTF to buy fishing nets and other equipment. She has been in her current line of work for six years and would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
El socio Miguel nació en la ciudad de Anta, vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica principal del socio Miguel es la venta de productos de primera necesidad en la ciudad de Anta y tiene un pequeño local alquilado, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar productos de primera necesidad como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar,  cajas de refrescos, cajas de galletas, bolsas de golosinas y otros cosas más. 
  
El socio Miguel pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen Inmaculada Concepción de Anta” de la Asociación Arariwa de la provincia del Cusco.
texts.en:
Miguel was born in the city of Anta and lives in the city in which he was born.  His main business activity is selling basic household products in the city of Anta where he rents small premises.  On this occasion, he needs a loan to buy basic household products such as sacks of rice and sugar, boxes of soft drinks and cookies, bags of candies and other products.

Miguel is a member of Asociación Arariwa's "Virgen Inmaculada Concepción de Anta" community bank in Cusco province.

loans.use: to buy basic household products

loans.name: Shermahmad

texts.ru: Шермахмад добрый и трудолюбивый человек, на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей и выращиванием крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Его бизнес налажен хорошо и он продвигает его вперед. С первой прибыли он построил теплицу и там выращивает помидоры. Шермахмад намерен закупить скот для откорма и с этой целью запрашивает займ в размере 7500 сомони.
texts.en: Shermahmad is  a kind and hardworking person, who is raising two children.  He has been involved in buying-selling and raising cattle and small livestock for over five years.  His business is set up well, and he continues to move it ahead.  He built a greenhouse with his first profit and grows tomatoes there.  Shermahmad intends to buy livestock for fattening up and is requesting a loan in the amount of 7500 somoni for this purpose.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Delia

texts.en: Delia is 42 years old, married and the mother of two children. She earns a living by raising and fattening pigs in the Philippines, and has requested a loan for PHP 25,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed for her livestock. She has been in her current line of work for 24 years and earns additional income on the side from buying and selling piglets. She is working tirelessly to attain her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Albina

texts.es:
La  Sra. Albina es de la ciudad de Santaní, tiene 42 años de edad, esta casada con el Sr. Arnaldo de 36 años de edad. Tienen 2 hijos, por quienes ambos siempre se esfuerzan para poder sacarlos adelante.
Albina tiene una despensa en su  propia casa, y comenta que gracias a su buena atención sumada a sus buenos precios, ya ha podido formarse una buena clientela. Su meta es poder seguir invirtiendo en su negocio e ir creciendo para pdoer mejorar sus ingresos y seguir ayudando a sus hijos.
Ella solicita el crédito para abastecer su negocio con bebidas, lácteos, enlatados, productos a granel y demás. Albina agradece por la ayuda que recibe, pues le será muy útil.
texts.en:
Sra. Albina is from the city of Santani. She is 42 years old and married to Sr. Arnald, 36. They have two children whom they both strive to move ahead.

Albina has a small store in her home and notes that, thanks to her good service and low prices, she has been able to establish a good customer base. Her goal is to be able to continue investing in her business and to keep growing so that she can improve earnings and continue to help her children.

She is applying for a loan to stock her business with drinks, dairy products, canned goods, bulk products and other items. Albina is grateful for the help she is receiving, since it will be very useful.

loans.use: to purchase drinks, dairy products, canned goods, bulk products and other items.

loans.name: Sarantuya

texts.en: Sarantuya is a 39 year old and lives with her family in the outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia.  She supports her family by operating a felt souvenir business.  She usually makes felt bags, saucers and sandals. Foreigners who are travelling in Mongolia are customers of her. Saraa distributes her goods to local indoor and outdoor markets, stalls, whole suppliers and souvenir shops.  Summer is the very high shopping season for her business because a lot of tourists came here to travel and they do shopping through souvenir shops.  Thus she is requesting a 2.500.000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) loan to purchase felts to make her goods for sale. In addition, she is one very trusted client of our institution.

loans.use: to purchase a raw materials, such as felt, to make a variety of souvenirs.

loans.name: Dargah

texts.en: Dargah is a kind and hard working person. He is not married. He is 34 years old. For over four years, he has been involved in agriculture. He keeps cows and sells milk products from his yard. Currently, Dargah has two cows. In order to expand his business, he would like to obtain a loan of 1000 AZN to purchase a cow to increase his sales.

loans.use: To buy one cow to increase the selling.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en: Rosita is 50 years old and married with three children. She lives in Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. For the past 11 years, Rosita has been planting and harvesting flowers for sale. She earns 6,000 each month. Rosita joined GDMPC in 2011. Rosita is requesting a 12,000 loan from GDMPC to buy seedlings and fertilizer. In the future, Rosita plans to expand her business to uplift her family's income and provide for their day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer.

loans.name: Saimudasir

texts.ru: Саймудасир добрый и трудолюбивый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством, а Саймудасир сам содержит свою семью. Он работает в открытом акционерном обществе по производству молочных продуктов. Данный бизнес является хорошим бизнесом, так как в любое время года имеет своих покупателей. Саймудасир хотел бы получить займ и намерен использовать его для ремонта своего дома. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Saimudasir is a kind and hardworking person, who is married and raising three children.  His wife is involved in household work, and Saimudasir supports the family by himself.  He works at a public joint-stock company that manufactures milk products.  This business is a good business because it attracts customers at any time of the year.  Saimudasir wants to obtain this loan and intends to use it to repair his house.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Abdullo

texts.ru: Абдулло женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 3-х лет она занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Имеет широкий ассортимент конфет, печеньев и других видов сладостей и продуктов. Абдулло намерен расширить свой бизнес, чтобы стать успешным предпринимателем. Абдулло запрашивает займ для покупки продуктов питания с целью расширения ассортимента товара. Он надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость.
texts.en: Abdullo is married and raising two children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Abdullo has been involved in buying and selling food products for over three years.  He has a wide assortment of candy, cookies and other types of sweets and products.  Abdullo intends to expand his business in order to become a successful entrepreneur.  Abdullo is requesting this loan to buy food products to expand his product selection.  He relies on your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie works hard to support her family. She is married and has a vegetable selling business in the Philippines.

Elvie requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell in her food stall.

She has been in this business for 20 years.

In the future, Elvie would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Ma. Remedios

texts.en:
Ma. Remedios works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Ma. Remedios requested a PHP 11000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

She has been in this business for 3 years.

In the future, Ma. Remedios would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en: Evangeline is from Camanga, Tukuran, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 65 years old, widowed and has one child. Evangeline owns and operates a dressmaking business, where she manufactures and sells clothing products and she also manages a retail business. Evangeline has been in her business for five years and earns 15,000 a month from it. In 2009, Evangeline joined GDMPC. Evangeline is requesting a loan of 25,000 which will be used to buy threads, needles and more supplementary goods for her store. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to buy threads, needles and more supplementary goods for her store.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane works hard to support her family. She is married and has a computer gaming business in the Philippines.

Mary Jane requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy an additional unit of computer for gaming.

She has been in this business for 4 years.

In the future, Mary Jane would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy an additional unit of computer for games.

loans.name: Janepher

texts.en: Janepher is married with three children and all of her children go to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family members.  She has a business of selling charcoal and has been in this business for two years.  She has applied for a loan of 600000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more bales of used clothes. She moves door to door selling used clothes.  She works six days a week. Besides this clothing business she generates additional income through selling charcoal at home. Her major business challenges includes the rainy season which hinders her movements and the ever increasing prices of used clothes. She is aspiring to see her business grow big so that she can get a permanent business premises and build rental rooms.  She resides in a home that she owns and the family has access to electricity and piped water.

loans.use: To buy more bales of used clothes.

loans.name: Chimgee

texts.en:
Chimgee is a 35 year-old married lady who lives with her family in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They live in a ger, traditional Mongolian felt tent in the outer 'ger' district (a district without basic infrastructure). Chimgee’s son and daughters are both secondary school pupils. 

Chimgee supports her family by operating a retail clothing stall at the largest indoor market in Mongolia. When she first began her business in 2008, Chimgee had 800,000 MNT in working capital. Today, her business has grown and she has about 8,000,000 MNT in working capital. Chimgee sells jeans and trousers. “I want to grow my business more with this loan and I would like to be able to buy my own apartment in the future and live there with my family,” she says. 

Chimgee is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to increase the variety of jeans and trousers she sells because as she says, "because it’s the time of high shopping season in Mongolia."

loans.use: to purchase jeans to sell for the upcoming season.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El Sr. Francisco es de la ciudad de Concepción, tiene 70 años, de profesión albañil, esta casado con la señora Juana de  de 60 años de edad. Francisco es una persona muy sacrificada y comenta que desde siempre ha trabajado y es que gracias a ese trabajo que ha podido ayudar a su familia.
Pese a su edad el Sr. Francisco tiene muchas ganas de seguir trabajando y ayudando con el día a día de la casa. El comenta que aun tiene mucho porque luchar y es por ello que se esfuerza.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas, con lo cual se le facilitara mucho su trabajo. Quiere comprar cucharas, baldes, metros, reglas y demás insumos de albañilería. Don Francisco agradece a la fundación y a Kiva por la oportunidad que le están dando.
texts.en:
Sr. Francisco is from the city of Concepción. He is 70 years old and a bricklayer. He is married to Sra. Juana, who is 60.  Francisco is a very self-sacrificing person and notes that he has always worked hard and it is thanks to that work that he has been able to help his family.

Despite his age, Sr. Francisco wants very much to continue working and helping with the day to day expenses of the household. He says he still has a lot worth fighting for and that is why he continues to strive.

He is applying for a loan to purchase tools, which would greatly facilitate his work. He wants to buy trowels, buckets, tape measures, rulers and other masonry supplies. Don Francisco is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for the opportunity they are giving him.

loans.use: to buy masonry tools.

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло трудолюбивая и добросовестная  женщина. Она разведена и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Она сама содержит свою семью и усердно работает ради светлого будущего своих детей. Более 10 лет она занимается шитьем и продажей женских платьев, также принимает заказы. Шахло намерена закупить разные ткани для пошива платьев. В бизнесе помогает ей её сестра. Шахло надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Shahlo is a hardworking and conscientious woman.  She is divorced and raising three children.  She supports her family by herself and works diligently to ensure a bright future for her children.  Shahlo has been involved in sewing and selling women's dresses for over ten years and also accepts orders.  She intends to buy various fabrics to sew dresses.  Her sister helps her with the business.  Shahlo relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Maricar

texts.en: Maricar is 39 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom attend school. Maricar is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Maricar requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and additional pigs to raise. Maricar has been raising pigs for nine years now, and has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Maricar would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To buy feed and additional pigs to raise

loans.name: Rosarii

texts.en: Rosarii is 44 years old, married, and has 10 children, four of whom are in school. Rosarii is in the agricultural business, raising hogs in the Philippines. Rosarii requested a 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and medicine for her hogs. Rosarii has been raising hogs for three years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Rosarii would like to save money to expand her business and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicine for her pigs.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en: Sofia is 55 years old, married, and has three children. Sofia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Sofia requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs. Sofia has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business. In the future, Sofia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Mastura

texts.ru: Мастура трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет одного сына и двух дочерей. Они все учатся в школе. Муж занимается рыбоводством. Она занимается предоставлением компьютерных услуг. Она начинала свою деятельность с 1 копировального аппарата в 2002 году, затем постепенно получая прибыли расширила бизнес и сейчас имеет 4 шт. компьютера, 2 шт. ксерокопии формата А 3. Она предоставляет услуги  по распечатке разных документов, ксерокопии и ламинированию документов и фотографий. Мастура запрашивает займ для покупки компьютера и ксерокса.
texts.en: Mastura is a hardworking and conscientious woman.  She is married and raising one son and two daughters, all of whom attend a school.  Her husband is involved in aquafarming.  Mastura is involved in providing computer services.  She started her business with one copy machine in 2002 and then gradually expanded her business by using her profits, and now has four computers and two A3-format copy machines.  She provides services of printing various documents, copying and laminating documents and photographs.  Mastura is requesting this loan to buy a computer and a copy machine.

loans.use: to purchase a computer and a copy machine

loans.name: William

texts.es: William de 45 años, es padre de una hija en la edad de 19 y vive al sur de la ciudad, donde tiene su propia refresquería, producto de la tradición familiar pues sus padres tuvieron una tienda donde vendían al detalle artículos de la canasta familiar, refrescos y bebidas frías, posteriormente su hermano asumió este negocio, que finalmente liquidó y fue así como William aprovechó ese punto estratégico ara iniciar su refresquería, ubicada en un sitio muy transitado y de afluencia peatonal, que potencializa su crecimiento. Hace un año William accedió a su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y logró hacer adecuaciones a su negocio mejoró los espacios húmedos y con ello hoy ofrece un ambiente mas confortable a sus clientes. Entre sus metas está mas adelante,  fortalecer su estrategia mercadológica, abriendo un nuevo punto de ventas, porque quiere aprovechar su experiencia para genera mas ingresos y continuar creciendo empresarialmente.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación con él comprará cajas de refrescos, bebidas y pasabocas pues se prepara para una de las épocas mas concurridas por sus clientes, el mes de Mayo y sus celebraciones familiares y religiosas que demandan muchos de sus productos y hacen en unión con su experiencia, que esta inversión sea muy exitosa.
texts.en: William is 45 years old. He is the father of a nineteen year old daughter and he lives in the southern part of the city, where he has own drink store. The store is part of a family tradition. His parents had a store where they sold basic retail goods and cold drinks. Later, his brother took over the business, which he eventually sold. This is how William took advantage of this strategic spot to start his own drink store. It is located in a high-traffic pedestrian area, which provides his business with a chance to grow. A year ago, William took out his first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo [Mario Santo Domingo Foundation], which he used to make improvements to his business by cleaning up damp areas so that today he has a more comfortable environment for his customers. Among his next goals is fortifying his marketing strategy by opening a new sales point. He wants to take advantage of his experience to generate more sales and continue growing his business. Currently, he is requesting this Kiva loan, which will be his second loan with the Foundation, to purchase cases of beer, alcohol, and snacks so that he can prepare for one of his busiest times of the year, the month of May. May brings family and religious celebrations, which place a demand on his products. These demands, together with his experience, will make this investment very successful.

loans.use: to purchase cases of beer, alcohol, and snacks.

loans.name: Claudia Isabel

texts.es: Claudia está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, pues comprará en mayor volumen mercancía e insumos para elaborar accesorios, con los cuales responder a la credibilidad que ha ganado con sus clientes y esto la tiene muy feliz. Ella ultimamente invirtió en publicidad, como empaques y también compró en mayor volumen, insumos con los cuales elaboró muchos productos variados y ganó descuentos, al comprar de contado. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “ Un mensaje de agradecimiento a los fondeadores, por la oportunidad de brindar los fondos económicos para el crecimiento de mi negocio y mi futura empresa”.
texts.en:
Claudia is applying for a new Kiva loan in order to buy a large volume of merchandise, as well as supplies for making accessories. This will enable her to respond to the popularity she has gained among her customers, which makes her very happy. Lately she has invested in advertising and packaging, but she has also purchased supplies in large volumes for making many different products. She was able to obtain discounts by paying with cash.

Her message to the Kiva lenders is as follows: "I send a message of appreciation to the lenders for the opportunity to access funding to grow my business and my future enterprise."

loans.use: to buy a large volume of merchandise and supplies for making accessories.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El señor Juan es soltero, tiene 1 hijo, quien es su razón de ser, y por quien el lucha incansablemente para poder darle lo que necesita y que no tenga que pasar por necesidades.
Juan es dueño de una peluquería Unisex, realiza cortes para damas, caballero y niños, Manicure, pedicura y depilaciones en general. Empezó con su trabajo en Buenos Aires en una academia de alto estilo, trabajo ahí por 2 años pero decidió volver al país. Hoy en día ya tiene un negocio bien montado con buena clientela.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de una motocicleta, la cual le servirá para transportarse a su negocio y también hacer trabajos a domicilio y de esa forma cumplir con sus clientes. Esto le ayudará a seguir creciendo como profesional.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan is single and has a son who is his reason for living. Therefore, he strives tirelessly to provide him with what he needs so that he does not have to feel deprived.

Juan is the owner of a unisex salon where she provides haircuts for women, men, and children. He also offers services such as manicures, pedicures, and hair removal. Juan started working at a high-end styling academy in Buenos Aires. He worked at that job for two years before deciding to return to Paraguay. Today he has a well-established business with a good customer base.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a motorcycle that he will use for traveling to his business and to jobs performed at the homes of his customers. This will help him continue growing as a professional.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Yasney

texts.es: Yasney de 30 años vive con su cónyuge y su hija de 11 años de edad, en el Municipio de Soledad. Allí tiene su negocio de venta de plátanos, actividad a la que se dedicó, aprovechando la experiencia de la familia de su cónyuge, quien se dedica a ella comercializando  en un mayor volumen; así fue como en el año 2010, empezó haciendo preventa de tienda en tienda y de vecino en vecino, como con ello le fue bien, se entusiasmó y decidió dedicarse a este negocio en pleno. Hoy su negocio ha crecido, porque ha logrado concentrar mucha clientela, entre tenderos, distribuidores al menudeo y familias vecinas. Con su cónyuge desean  concentrar sus esfuerzos en  su negocio, para mas adelante tener un local desde donde distribuir los plátanos, adicionando verduras también. En la actualidad su capital de trabajo se convierte en su gran desafío para lograr alcanzar sus sueños y esta es justamente la razón por la cual acuden a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará plátanos en mayor volumen, pues tiene una clientela a quien le hace créditos y debe esperar recuperar toda su cartera para responder a nuevos clientes, que son la fuente del crecimiento que ella espera. Mientras trabaja para lograr sus metas, maneja una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 5%, apropiada para este negocio, indicador financiero desde la cual proyectamos su crecimiento empresarial y auguramos su éxito con el credikiva.
texts.en:
Yasney, 30, lives with her spouse and 11-year-old daughter in the town of Soledad.  There she has her business selling bananas, making the most of the experience of her husband's family, who sell bananas wholesale.

This was how she began making sales from store to store and neighbor to neighbor in 2010.  Since it went well for her, she got excited and decided to work in this business full time.  Today her business has grown because she has been able to concentrate on a lot of customers, between shopkeepers, retail distributors, and neighbor families.  She and her husband want to focus their efforts on her business so that later on they can get a place for distributing the bananas, adding vegetables as well.

Currently her working capital has become her biggest challenge to realizing her dreams.  This is exactly why she is coming for a Kiva loan, the first loan she has received from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will buy bananas wholesale because she has customers to whom she gives credit and she has to wait for her portfolio to recover before she can respond to new customers, who are the source of growth she is hoping for.

While she works to realize her goals, she manages a sales profitability of no less than 5%, suitable for this business, an economic indicator from which we [Fundación Mario Santo Domingo] project her business growth and predict her success with the Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy bananas wholesale.

loans.name: Bendicion Group

texts.es:
El comité Bendición es un grupo excelente. Este comité es de la Ciudad de San lorenzo,  ellas se fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas, no solo en lo económico, sino también en lo personal.
La Sra. Rossana, presidenta del grupo tiene 35 años, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y emprendedora, está casada, y tiene 3 hijos. Ella nos comenta que es estilista y a la vez comerciante, y gracias a estos trabajos puede ayudar a su familia. Comenta que tiene muy buena clientela, ya que ella es una persona muy amable y con muy buena onda.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de spray, tintes, tijeras, peines y demás insumos para poder seguir trabajando de estilista. Esta muy agradecida por la ayuda que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
The Committee, "Bendición" (Blessing) is an excellent group from the city of San Lorenzo, and is made up of members whose primary objective is to grow in both economic and personal ways. 

Rossana is the president of the group, and is 35 years old. She is a hard working, entrepreneurial woman who is married and has three children. She is a hair stylist and businesswoman who, thanks to her job and hard work, can help provide for her family. She enjoys her clients very much, and is well liked by all of them, as she is a kind and outgoing person.

She is requesting this loan in order to purchase hair spray, dyes, scissors, combs and other products to continue her work as a stylist. She is very grateful for the support she is receiving.

loans.use: to purchase hair spray, dyes, scissors, combs and other items.

loans.name: Otabek

texts.ru: Отабек женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Жена занимается домашними делами, а Отабек зарабатывает деньги на содержание семьи. Более 5 лет он занимается перевозкой пассажиров, точнее предоставлением услуг такси по городу. А также он ездит на заказы за пределы города. Отабек очень опытный водитель и все его клиенты доверяет ему на свои безопасности во время проезда. Отабек хотел бы получить займ для установки газового оборудования для своего автомобиля марки «Тикко». Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Otabek is married and a responsible father of two children.  His wife is involved in household work, and Otabek earns money to support the family.  He has been involved in passenger transportation, specifically providing taxi services within the city, for over five years.  He also drives outside the city as needed.  Otabek is a very experienced driver, and all of his clients trust him with their safety during the transportation time.  Otabek wants to obtain this loan to install a gas equipment for his "Tikko" car.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to install gas equipment

loans.name: Kriya's Group

texts.en:
As a parent of four, Kriya and her husband have been planting cassava to support the family for over 10 years. Her family lives in a house built from bamboo walls located in Dambae district.

Kriya has been with VisionFund since 2011. Having successfully paid all her previous two loans, Kriya is now requesting another loan from VisionFund. As a leader, Kriya will use a portion of her loan to pay labor fees for her farmland and buy fertilizers for her crops. She hopes the loan will enable her to grow cassava with good yield and sell them for good price so that she can have sufficient money to feed the family and set aside some money for her childrens' educations.

loans.use: To pay the labor fees for her farmland and buy feritlizers for her crops.

loans.name: Fortaleza Group

texts.es:
El comité “Fortaleza” se encuentra en el séptimo ciclo del programa de la Fundación Paraguaya, tiene 18 integrantes. Todas las integrantes del grupo se esmeran día a día en las calles, llevando el pan de cada día a sus hogares y tratando de dar a sus hijos un futuro diferente del que a ellas toco vivir.
Maria es parte del grupo, y con mucho esfuerzo esta saliendo adelante y por medio de su trabajo ayuda a su familia. Ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración de bijouterie. Comenta que es muy creativa y siempre tiene novedades por lo que le va bien. Ella se define como una persona muy entusiasta, trabajadora y creativa.
Ella pide una ayuda para poder invertirlo en su negocio y comprar perlas, hilos, pinzas y demás insumos para seguir haciendo sus bijous.
texts.en:
The committee named "Fortaleza" (Strength) is in its seventh loan cycle with the program at Fundación Paraguaya.  The group has 18 members, all of whom strive to make their daily living on the streets so that they can provide for their households and give their children a future that is different than the lives they experienced themselves.  

Maria is part of this group.  She strives to move forward with great effort in her work so that she can help her family.  Maria produces and sells trinkets.  She says that she is doing well because she is very creative and always has new ideas.  Maria defines herself as an enthusiastic, hardworking, and creative person.  She is requesting assistance so that she can invest in her business.  Maria will buy beads, thread, pliers, and other supplies so that she can continue producing trinkets.

loans.use: to buy beads, thread, pliers, and other supplies.

loans.name: Maria Corina

texts.es:
María es agricultora y vive en Santa Cruz Lempira, una aldea rural ubicada en el departamento de Gracias Lempira. La señora María tiene 35 años de edad y vive en Unión libre con su compañero con el cual procreó 2 hijos.
Doña María tiene una finca de cuarto manzana donde siembra café. Ella empezó a sembrar hace 5 años por necesidad de tener una actividad rentable para sostenerse. Afortunadamente la zona en que ella vive es muy buena para el cultivo y ella ha logrado aumentar su rendimiento en cada cosecha. La economía de Lempira es basada en la agricultura, especialmente el cultivo de café.
 La señora está sacando su quinto préstamo de 15,000 lempiras el cual invertirá en compra de fertilizante para el mantenimiento del cultivo y otra parte para pagar el corte del café. El café es uno de los cultivos más rentables de Honduras. Ella espera que con su labor y dedicación, su finca siga creciendo.
Su meta es que con esta inversión mejoren sus condiciones de vida para que sus hijos puedan seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
María works in agriculture and lives in Santa Cruz Lempira, a rural village located in Gracias Lempira Department.  María is 35 years old and lives in a common law relationship with her spouse; they have two children.

María has a farm measuring ¼-manzana [Central American unit of land measurement] where she grows coffee.  She started farming five years ago needing to have a profitable activity to support herself with.  Fortunately, the zone where she lives is very good for farming and she’s managed to increase crop yields each harvest.  Lempira’s economy is based on agriculture, especially coffee growing.

She is taking out her fifth loan in the amount of 15,000 lempiras to use to buy fertilizer for crop maintenance and the other part to pay to harvest the coffee beans.  Coffee is one of Honduras’ most profitable crops and she hopes that with her labor and dedication her farm will continue to grow.  Her goal is that with this investment her living conditions will improve so that her children can continue with their schooling.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Rahmonkul

texts.ru: Рахмонкул имеет большую дружную семью. Он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Жена работает поваром в школе. Рахмонкул работает в ГУП «ТАлКО» литейщиком с 1987 года. Имеет хороший авторитет среди односельчан и сотрудников. Рахмонкул хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия, чтобы создать уюта и комфорта своей семье. Рахмонкур запрашивает займ для строительства и реконструкцию хозяйственной части жилья.
texts.en: Rahmonkul has a large and friendly family.  He is married and raising five children.  His wife works as a cook at a school.  Rahmonkul has been working at a municipal company "TAlKO" as a caster since 1987.  He has a lot of respect among his neighbors in the village and coworkers.  Rahmonkul wants to improve his living conditions in order to provide comfort and convenience for his family.  Rahmonkul is requesting this loan for building and reconstructing the utility part of his house.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Salomat

texts.ru: Саломат трудолюбивая женщина, она вдова и сама воспитывает двух сыновей. Старшему 20 лет, является студентом, а младшему 17 лет, и он учится в школе. Она занимается купле- продажей парфюмерии, она начала свою деятельность с маленькой прилавки с продажи игрушек, семечек и т.д. По ходу расширила бизнес и перешла на реализацию парфюмерии. Саломат запрашивает займ для покупки товара с целью увлечения ассортимента товара. Она надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие.
texts.en: Salomat is a hardworking woman.  She is a widow and raising two sons by herself.  The oldest son is 20 years old and is a student, and the youngest is 17 years old and attends a school.  Salomat is involved in buying and selling perfumes and started her business with a small stand, where she sold toys, seeds and the like.  Along the way, she expanded her business and transitioned to selling perfumes.  Salomat is requesting this loan to buy merchandise in order to expand her goods selection.  She relies on your support and mercy.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Martha Elena

texts.es:
Martha es una mujer de  37 años de edad, de  estado civil casada, con hijos a su cargo, vive en casa propia con su cónyuge e hijos, en la parte rural del distrito de Mochumi, departamento de Lambayeque. Solo cuentan con el servicio básico de energía eléctrica y el consumo de agua lo hacen a través de norias artesanales; la mayoría de familias viven en estas condiciones.


La actividad principal a la que se dedica Martha  es la compra y venta de animales como: cerdos, chivos, gallinas, pavos, estos los engorda a base de concentrado y cuando alcanzan el tamaño y peso exacto ella los comercializa a los comerciantes mayoristas de la zona, es decir ella cuenta con experiencia en este tipo de negocio. Así mismo también se dedica a la venta  de ropa como: polos, camisas, pantalones, truza, etc., este .negocio lo tiene en su propio domicilio y le permite tener otros ingresos.

El  monto del préstamo solicitado por Martha es de S/. 3,000 nuevos soles y  se destinara para  la compra  de animales (pavos, patos, chivos, cerdos) y compra de alimentos balanceados (maíz, polvillo, purina y vitaminas); actualmente  se ha propuesto  en incrementar su negocio  ya que le es muy rentable en la zona, y le va permitir mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Martha, 37, is married with children in her care; she lives in her own house with her spouse and children in the rural part of Mochumí District in Lambayeque Province.  They only have electricity and water is obtained from artesian wells; most of the families live under these conditions.

Martha’s main activity is buying and selling animals like pigs, goats, chickens and turkeys that she fattens up with feed concentrate and when they reach exact size and weight she sells them to local wholesale merchants; she has experience in this type of business.  She also sells clothes like t-shirts, pants, briefs, etc.  She has this business at home and it allows her to earn extra income.

The amount of the loan María is requesting is 3,000 new soles to buy animals (turkeys, ducks, goats and pigs) and nutritionally balanced feed (corn, polvillo [made from rice], Purina and vitamins).  

She’s set the goal for herself of increasing her business because it’s quite profitable in the zone; this will allow her to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El Sr. Pedro se dedica a la venta de ropas, y es gracias a este trabajo ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su familia. Gracias al crédito que recibió de kiva ha podido ir creciendo e invirtiendo en sus negocios. Una vez más acude a kiva y a la fundación paraguaya para solicitar una ayuda, con lo cual quiere comprar prendas de invierno, ya que se acerca la temporada de frío y quiere poder ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes.
Pedro agradece por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo nuevamente.
texts.en:
Pedro sells clothes and thanks to this work has been able to get ahead and help his family.  Thanks to the loan he got from Kiva he’s been able to grow and invest in his businesses. 

He is calling on Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya once more to ask for support to buy winter clothes because the cold season is approaching and he wants to be able to have more variety to offer his customers.

Pedro is grateful for the opportunity he’s receiving once again.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes to sell.

loans.name: Mutabar

texts.ru: Мутабар замужем и заботливая мать двоих детей. Муж работает в России. Более 13 лет она занимается купле-продажей тканей. Имеет широкий ассортимент товаров. В основном она продает разные виды национального атласа. Имеет много постоянных клиентов. Мутабар хотела бы получить займ для покупки тканей с целью расширения ассортимента товаров. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Mutabar is married and a caring mother of two children.  Her husband works in Russia.  She has been involved in buying and selling fabrics for over 13 years.  She has a wide selection of merchandise.  Mutabar primarily sells various types of national atlas fabric.  She has many regular customers.  Mutabar wants to obtain this loan to buy fabrics in order to expand the merchandise selection.  She relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is 45 years old and married with six children. She works hard to provide for her family.

Sylvia runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 15,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more items to sell like snack foods, noodles, and other miscellaneous items.

Sylvia has borrowed and paid loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 15 years and also earns an income from rice retailing. She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell like snack foods, noodles, and other miscellaneous items.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 63 years old and married with seven children.

Teresita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a loan of 16,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more stock for her general store to sell.

Teresita has borrowed and paid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 8 years and also earns an income from clothing sales. She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her general store to sell.

loans.name: Fernando Jose

texts.es:
El señor Fernando de 52 años de edad es originario de Granada, casado, padre de 6 hijos que están a su cargo, de oficio comerciante se dedica a la producción y venta de Nacatamales. Inicio su actividad desde hace 25 años ayudándole a su mama ya que ella se dedicaba a la misma actividad y les enseño ese trabajo desde muy joven, después el se caso decidió independizarse empezó su negocio de elaboración y venta de Nacatamales con capital propio recibiendo el apoyo de su esposa, sus productos los comercializa a domicilio en los alrededores de la comunidad. Cuenta con otros ingresos ya que aprovecha la temporada de cosecha para salir a vender productos como aguacate, jocote y tamarindo.
Realiza el préstamo para comprar manteca, naranja , chiltoma, cebolla, carne, etc, toda la materia prima para poder elaborar sus nacatamales. Este crédito le ayudara porque le permitirá aumentar sus ventas obteniendo mayor ganancia debido a la alta rotación del producto, sus planes futuros es comprar y vender mas frutas en temporadas de cosechas, sus metas próximas es convertir en un comerciante fuerte , solido y tener un mejor nivel de vida con su familia.
texts.en:
Fernando is 52 years old, and is from Granada, Nicaragua. He is married, and is the father of six children who depend on him. He makes a living making and selling Nacatamales (traditional meat and vegetable tamales). He started working in this business over 25 years ago learning and cooking with his mother, who made the same food items. When he was married, he decided to continue working independent of his mother’s business. With support from his wife, and with their own funds, he opened his Nacatamale business out of their home in the outskirts of the community. He relies on the income he makes in this business, and tries to take advantage of harvest seasons in the area, when many workers may want to purchase his food items, as well as other items, such as avocados, tamarind and jocote fruit.

He is requesting this loan in order to purchase butter, oranges, peppers, onions, meat and other necessary items for making Nacatamales. This loan will help him to increase his output, sales and income. His future plans are to increase his fruit sales during harvest seasons, and his goals include becoming an important and successful businessman who can provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to purchase butter, oranges, peppers, onions and meat.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of 3 children, Rebecca works hard to support her family.

She has a business of selling spices in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a coffee shop. Rebecca is borrowing 23,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more stock of spices to sell in her stall.

Rebecca has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock of spices to sell.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is married and has four children. He is 44 years old and lives in Upper Bayao, Tukuran, Philippines. 

Daniel used his last loan to purchase fertilizer such as manure. His business is successful, and he is taking a new loan to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next cropping. 

In the future, he hopes to be able to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for the next cropping.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.en:
Magdalena works hard to support her family. She is married and has a ready-to-wear business in the Philippines.

Magdalena requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy umbrellas, shirts, blouses, and slippers to sell.

She has been in this business for eight years.

In the future, Magdalena would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy umbrellas, shirts, blouses, and slippers to sell.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley works hard to support her family. She is married and has a clothing sales business in the Philippines.

Shirley requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy shorts, pillow cases, bags, beauty soap, etc. to sell.

She has been in this business for three years.

In the future, Shirley would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy shorts, pillow cases, bags, beauty soap, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime es un hombre trabajador, es padre de 2 hijos a los cuales quiere mucho y apoya con lo que puede ya que hace algunos años quedo viudo, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Pucallpa, la ciudad de Pucallpa se encuentra en la selva peruana, esta ciudad alberga flora y fauna muy bella, es un lugar donde uno puede apreciar lo hermoso de la naturaleza y sobre todo relajarse. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es la Sarapatera, el cual es un plato típico de la zona. El solo puedo estudiar hasta el segundo grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Mecánica Automotriz.

Con mucho entusiasmo Jaime trabaja en su negocio de venta de raspadillas y refrescos, trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 30 clientes, también trabaja como chofer de mototaxi sobre todo cuando hay clientes que no tienen como movilizarse;  él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes.

Jaime está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una mesa y una sombrilla para dar una mejor atención a sus clientes, así el podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener para la venta de pescado y sal”.
texts.en:
Jaime is a hardworking man, the father of two children he loves very much and supports in any way he can since he became a widower a few years ago.  His house is located in the city of Pucallpa.  

The city of Pucallpa is located in the Peruvian jungle.  This city harbors very beautiful flora and fauna; it’s a place where one can enjoy the beauty of nature and above all to relax.  When he has free time available he enjoys eating one of his favorite dishes which is “Sarapatera” [turtle soup], a dish that’s typical of the region.  He was only able to study up to second year of secondary school but would have liked to have studied Auto Mechanics.

Jaime works with much enthusiasm selling shaved ice and soft-drinks.  He works around 10 hours daily and can tend to up to 30 customers.  He also works driving a mototaxi above all when there are customers who don’t have a way to get around.  He believes that he does well in his business because he’s very kind to his customers.

Jaime is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they’ve given him he will be able to buy a table and an umbrella to provide better customer serviced so that he can continue working toward attaining his greatest dream:  to have what he needs to sell fish and salt.

loans.use: to buy a table and an umbrella.

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Lilibeth is 61 years old and married with four children. Lilibeth works very hard to provide for them. 

Lilibeth runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and has requested a 13,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell. Lilibeth has been in this business for 11 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sugar, soap, and snack foods. In the future Lilibeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her store.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en: Florence is married and has four children, all of whom go to school. She doesn’t take care of any additional family members. She has a business selling bananas and has been in this business for four years. Florence has applied for a loan of 700,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bunches of bananas. In addition to this business, she sells telephone airtime. She sells to all categories of people on a retail basis and works seven days a week from her home. Her major business challenges include stiff competition and ever increasing prices of bananas due to too much rain in the villages of Masaka. She is hoping to see her business grow so that she can start going to villages for bananas and also so she can build her own house. She resides in a rented house and has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of bananas

loans.name: Jean

texts.en:
Jean works hard to support her family. She is married and has a soft drinks retail business in the Philippines.

Jean requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock of soft drinks to sell to customers.

She has been in this business for two years.

In the future, Jean would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of soft drinks to sell to customers.

loans.name: Ma. Rosalinda

texts.en:
Ma. Rosalinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines.

Ma. Rosalinda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy tools and equipment for her tricycle transportation business.

She has been in this business for a year.

In the future, Ma. Rosalinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy tools and equipment for her tricycle transportation business.

loans.name: Ninfa

texts.en:
Ninfa is 58 years old and married with two children.

Ninfa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Ninfa has borrowed and paid thirteen loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for twenty years and also earns an income from selling frozen foods.

Ninfa aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of four children, Ruth works hard to support her family.

She has a coffee shop business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from clothing sales.  Ruth is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy coffee, sugar, and chairs for her coffee shop.

Ruth has been sustaining her business activities through her past fifteen loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy coffee, sugar, and chairs for her coffee shop.

loans.name: Sumac Tica Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de vecinos y amigos formaron el banco comunal “Sumac Tica” en la asociación pro vivienda de Cotowincho del distrito Urubamba de la provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de artesanía, venta de verduras, venta de productos secos, engorde de ganado, venta de cerveza, venta de jora, venta de comestibles, crianza de animales menores como gallinas y otros hacen servicio de limpieza y guardianía. 
 
(La señora Cipriana está levantando la mano en la fotografía). La socia Cipriana nació en la ciudad de Ollantaytambo en la provincia de Urubamba pero ahora vive en la ciudad de Cotowincho. Su actividad económica principal de Cipriana es la  venta de comida de forma ambulatoria. Ya son varios años se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. En esta oportunidad Cipriana requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo carne, verduras, sacos arroz, sacos azúcar y otras cosas más. 

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística por sus centros arqueológicos por su centro histórico por sus paisajes por su historia y siendo una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
A group of friends and neighbors formed the “Sumac Tica” communal bank in the Pro Vivienda association in Cotowincho in Urubamba District of Urubamba Province in Cusco Department.  This communal bank is formed by people who always seek opportunities to get ahead and by means of their daily efforts provide a better future for their children.  Some of the economic activities of the members are: crafts sales, vegetable sales, dry goods sales, cattle raising, beer sales, jora [corn based beverage] sales, food sales, raising small farm animals like chickens; others work cleaning and caretaking.

(Cipriana is raising her hand in the photo).  Cipriana was born in the city of Ollantaytambo in Urubamba Province but now lives in the city of Cotowincho.  Cipriana’s main economic activity is selling food from place to place.  She’s been in this business for several years now and thanks to the effort she puts into it does very well.  On this occasion, Cipriana wants to buy ingredients like meat, vegetables, sacks of rice and sugar and other things.

The members in general are grateful for the opportunity provided and commit to make their various installment payments according to the established schedule.

Cusco is located in Cusco District and Province and in Cusco Department in the very heart of the ancient city of the Incas.  It’s noted for being a tourist zone because of its archaeological sites, its historic city center, its scenery and its history; it’s an enchanting city in the country’s southern region.  Cusco is known as a very tourist oriented, commercial zone because of its traditional Inti Raymi festival and because one of the Seven Wonders of the World, Machupicchu, is located there.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Erick Alain

texts.es:
Erick es muy trabajador y entusiasta, tiene 34 años, vive al lado de su esposa y de su hijo de 5 añitos de edad, el cual le saca canas verdes porque es muy travieso, pero a pesar de ello no deja de luchar día a día para darle una vida feliz y con calidad ya que el lo ama muchísimo. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, esta ciudad se caracteriza por su clima caluroso en cualquier época del año, asimismo encontramos la laguna de Huacachina, la cual es visitada por infinidad de turistas en cualquier época del año, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura sobre todo el cultivo de algodón, paprika, esparrago y uva. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta arreglar cosas, pero también en algunas oportunidades aprovecha para comer uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pollo”. El solo tuvo estudios secundarios pero le hubiera gustado estudiar “Ingeniería Civil”.

Con mucho entusiasmo el día a día sale a trabajar en su negocio como operario de construcción, el le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 10 horas al día, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque siempre lo llaman para realizar trabajos ya que es muy responsable y cumplido.

Erick está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá alquilar maquinaria para construcción como trompo mezclador, palas, entre otros, así el podrá seguir trabajando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Erick is a very hard-working, enthusiastic 34-year-old man who lives with his wife and their son, who is 5 years old and very mischievous. They love their son very much, and work hard to provide a better future for him. Their home is located in the city of Ica, which is known for its year-round hot climate and for the Huacachina Lagoon, which is visited by countless tourists every year. Ica is located in an agricultural region that is known for growing cotton, paprika, asparagus and grapes. 

When he has free time, Erick likes to fix things, and also enjoys eating one of this favorite dishes, the delicious, “Arroz con Pollo,” (Chicken with Rice). He was able to complete his studies in secondary school, but would have liked to continue with a degree in civil engineering.  

Erick is enthusiastic in this daily work as a construction operator. He works about 10 hour per day, and he believes that his construction business is going so well because he is responsible, friendly, and always completes the orders that his clients give him.

Erick is very grateful to Kiva lenders, and thanks to their support, he will be able to rent machinery for his construction business, including a spin mixer, blades, and other machines. He hopes these investments will help him as he works to accomplish his great dream of giving his son the opportunity to choose a profession.

loans.use: to rent a spin mixer, blades, and other machines for his construction business.

loans.name: Abdurahim

texts.ru:
Абдурахим мужчина средних лет, работает фельдшерем в местном центре здоровья. Он женат имеет 3 детей.Дома он занимается откормом скота.Жена у него домахозяйка но она вместе с детьми помогет ухаживать за овцами и козами.Зароботная плата у него очень маленькая и не хватает на семейные нужды.Абдурахим хочет увеличить поголовье скота и поэтому решил обратиться в нашу организацию. Кредит получает  впервые.Он  мечтает, чтобы его дети поступили в лучшие учебные заведения и в будушем не нуждались не в чем, и для этого он копит деньги.
Абдурахим заранее благодарит нашу организацию за пддержку.
texts.en: Abdurahim is a middle-age man, who works as a nurse at a local health center.  He is married and has three children.  He is involved in fattening up livestock at home.  His wife is a homemaker, but together with the children, she helps to take care of sheep and goats.  Abdurahim's salary is very low and is not enough to cover the family's needs.  He wants to increase his livestock headcount and decided to come to our organization for this purpose.  This is his first loan.  He dreams that his children would get accepted to the best schools and will not be in need for anything in the future, and this is why he is saving money.  Abdurahim thanks our organization in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Lory

texts.en:
Lory works hard to support her family. She is single and has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines.

Lory requested a loan of 18,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy motor oil and to pay for the maintenance of her tricycle. She has been in this business for 4 years.

In the future, Lory would like to save enough money to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy motor oil and to pay for the maintenance of her tricycle.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en: Saumu is a single mother of four boys and three girls, three of whom are in school. She operates a food stall selling her goods at the market. She has been in this business for the last ten years. Saumu lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food and school fees. Seasonality is her major challenge facing her business. Saumu dreams of opening a hotel. The loan will enable her to purchase cooking fat, sugar, maize flour, and beans.

loans.use: to purchase cooking fat, sugar, maize flour, and beans.
